blocks.name: evth2f
blocks.content: A version of ~ evth2 using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm evth2f(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s1))))))
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| wnfc(s1, c1)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| wceq(c0, cuni(c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, ccmp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  sylib(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s1))))), wrex(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))))))
  evth2(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  bitri(wrex(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))))), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s1))))), wrex(s0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))))))
  cbvrexf(hs0, s0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))))
  nfcv(hs0, c0)
  nfral(s0, hs1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))))
  nfbr(s0, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))
  nffv(s0, c1, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, cle)
  nffv(s0, c1, cv(hs1))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs1))
  nfv(hs0, wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))))
  ralbidv(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))))
  breq1d(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), cfv(c1, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c1)
  rexbii(s0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))), wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))
  cbvralf(hs1, s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s1))))
  nfcv(hs1, c0)
  nfbr(s1, cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))
  nffv(s1, c1, cv(s0))
  nfcv(s1, cv(s0))
  nfcv(s1, cle)
  nffv(s1, c1, cv(hs1))
  nfcv(s1, cv(hs1))
  nfv(hs1, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s1))))
  breq2d(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), cfv(c1, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), cv(s1), c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cle.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.w(wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s1))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm evth2f(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s0)[≤](c1 ` s1))))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c1)
  ⊣ F/(s1, c1)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, c0)
  ⊣ c0 = ⋃ c2
  ⊣ c3 =(topGen ` ran((,)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ Comp)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈(c2[Cn]c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ≠ ∅)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  sylib(w0, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s0)[≤](c1 ` s1))), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0)[≤](c1 ` hs1))))
  evth2(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  bitri(∃(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0)[≤](c1 ` hs1))), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s0)[≤](c1 ` s1))), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s0)[≤](c1 ` hs1))))
  cbvrexf(hs0, s0, c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0)[≤](c1 ` hs1)), ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s0)[≤](c1 ` hs1)))
  nfcv(hs0, c0)
  nfral(s0, hs1, c0, (c1 ` hs0)[≤](c1 ` hs1))
  nfbr(s0, (c1 ` hs0), cle, (c1 ` hs1))
  nffv(s0, c1, hs0)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  nfcv(s0, cle)
  nffv(s0, c1, hs1)
  nfcv(s0, hs1)
  nfv(hs0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s0)[≤](c1 ` hs1)))
  ralbidv(hs1, c0, hs0 = s0, (c1 ` hs0)[≤](c1 ` hs1), (c1 ` s0)[≤](c1 ` hs1))
  breq1d((c1 ` hs0), cle, (c1 ` hs1), (c1 ` s0), hs0 = s0)
  fveq2(hs0, s0, c1)
  rexbii(s0, c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s0)[≤](c1 ` hs1)), ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s0)[≤](c1 ` s1)))
  cbvralf(hs1, s1, c0, (c1 ` s0)[≤](c1 ` hs1), (c1 ` s0)[≤](c1 ` s1))
  nfcv(hs1, c0)
  nfbr(s1, (c1 ` s0), cle, (c1 ` hs1))
  nffv(s1, c1, s0)
  nfcv(s1, s0)
  nfcv(s1, cle)
  nffv(s1, c1, hs1)
  nfcv(s1, hs1)
  nfv(hs1, (c1 ` s0)[≤](c1 ` s1))
  breq2d((c1 ` s0), cle, (c1 ` hs1), (c1 ` s1), hs1 = s1)
  fveq2(hs1, s1, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s0)[≤](c1 ` hs1)))
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 = s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cle.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.w((c1 ` s0)[≤](c1 ` s1))
}

blocks.name: elunif
blocks.content: A version of ~ eluni using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm elunif(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cuni(c1)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| diffcc(c0, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, cuni(c1)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))), diffcc(c0, c1))
  bitri(wcel(c0, cuni(c1)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(c0, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  eluni(hs0, c0, c1)
  cbvexv1(hs0, s0, wa(wcel(c0, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  nfan(s0, wcel(c0, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  nfel(s0, c0, cv(hs0))
  nfel(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfv(hs0, wa(wcel(c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(c0, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  eleq2w(hs0, s0, c0)
  eleq1w(hs0, s0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elunif(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ⋃ c1 ↔ ∃(s0,(c0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(c0, c1)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ ⋃ c1 ↔ ∃(s0,(c0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))), d(c0, c1))
  bitri(c0 ∈ ⋃ c1, ∃(s0,(c0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)), ∃(hs0,(c0 ∈ hs0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)))
  eluni(hs0, c0, c1)
  cbvexv1(hs0, s0, (c0 ∈ hs0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1), (c0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  nfan(s0, c0 ∈ hs0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  nfel(s0, c0, hs0)
  nfel(s0, hs0, c1)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  nfv(hs0, (c0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  anbi12d(hs0 = s0, c0 ∈ hs0, hs0 ∈ c1, c0 ∈ s0, s0 ∈ c1)
  eleq2w(hs0, s0, c0)
  eleq1w(hs0, s0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
}

blocks.name: fvelrnbf
blocks.content: A version of ~ fvelrnb using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvelrnbf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wfn(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, crn(c0)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))))
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
} = {
  syl6bb(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, crn(c0)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2)), wrex(hs0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2)))
  fvelrnb(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  cbvrexf(hs0, s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  nfeq(s0, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2)
  nffv(s0, c0, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfv(hs0, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))
  fveqeq2(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvelrnbf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0[Fn]c1 →(c2 ∈ ran(c0)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)= c2)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c1)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c2)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
} = {
  syl6bb(c0[Fn]c1, c2 ∈ ran(c0), ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)= c2), ∃(hs0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` hs0)= c2))
  fvelrnb(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  cbvrexf(hs0, s0, c1, (c0 ` hs0)= c2, (c0 ` s0)= c2)
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  nfeq(s0, (c0 ` hs0), c2)
  nffv(s0, c0, hs0)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  nfv(hs0, (c0 ` s0)= c2)
  fveqeq2(hs0, s0, c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ` s0)= c2)
}

blocks.name: rfcnpre1
blocks.content: If F is a continuous function with respect to the standard topology, then the preimage A of the values greater than a given extended real B is an open set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm rfcnpre1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wnfc(s0, c3)
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wceq(c5, cuni(c1))
  -| wceq(c0, crab(s0, c5, wbr(c2, clt, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, co(c1, ccn, c4)))
} = {
  eqeltrrd(c0, c1, cima(ccnv(c3), co(c2, cioo, cpnf)), w0)
  syl6eqr(cima(ccnv(c3), co(c2, cioo, cpnf)), c0, crab(s0, c5, wbr(c2, clt, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), w0)
  eqrd(s0, cima(ccnv(c3), co(c2, cioo, cpnf)), crab(s0, c5, wbr(c2, clt, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), w0)
  nfima(s0, ccnv(c3), co(c2, cioo, cpnf))
  nfcnv(s0, c3)
  nfov(s0, c2, cioo, cpnf)
  nfcv(s0, cioo)
  nfcv(s0, cpnf)
  nfrab1(s0, c5, wbr(c2, clt, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))
  3bitr4d(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c3), co(c2, cioo, cpnf))), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c5, wbr(c2, clt, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), co(c2, cioo, cpnf))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c5), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))))
  pm5.32da(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), co(c2, cioo, cpnf)), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5), wb(wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), co(c2, cioo, cpnf)), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cr))
  ffvelrnda(cv(s0), c5, c3, cr, w0)
  baibd(w0, wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cr), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), co(c2, cioo, cpnf)), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), co(c2, cioo, cpnf)), wa(wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cr), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))), wcel(c2, cxr))
  elioopnf(c2, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))
  3syl(w0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c3), co(c2, cioo, cpnf))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), co(c2, cioo, cpnf)))), wf(c3, c5, cr), wfn(c3, c5))
  simpld(w0, wf(c3, c5, cr), wral(hs0, c4, wcel(cima(ccnv(c3), cv(hs0)), c1)))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wf(c3, c5, cr), wral(hs0, c4, wcel(cima(ccnv(c3), cv(hs0)), c1))), wcel(c3, co(c1, ccn, c4)))
  sylancl(w0, wb(wcel(c3, co(c1, ccn, c4)), wa(wf(c3, c5, cr), wral(hs0, c4, wcel(cima(ccnv(c3), cv(hs0)), c1)))), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c5)), wcel(c4, cfv(ctopon, cr)))
  sylanblrc(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c5)), wcel(c1, ctop), wceq(c5, cuni(c1)))
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c3, co(c1, ccn, c4)))
  cntop1(c3, c1, c4)
  istopon(c1, c5)
  eqeltri(c4, cfv(ctopon, cr), cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  retopon()
  iscn(hs0, c1, c5, c4, cr, c3)
  ffn(c3, c5, cr)
  elpreima(c3, c5, cv(s0), co(c2, cioo, cpnf))
  a1i(w0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c5, wbr(c2, clt, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c5), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))))
  rabid(s0, c5, wbr(c2, clt, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))
  sylancl(w0, wcel(cima(ccnv(c3), co(c2, cioo, cpnf)), c1), wcel(c3, co(c1, ccn, c4)), wcel(co(c2, cioo, cpnf), c4))
  eleqtrri(co(c2, cioo, cpnf), c4, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  iooretop(c2, cpnf)
  cnima(c3, c1, c4, co(c2, cioo, cpnf))
  diff.cioo.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rfcnpre1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c2)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c3)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ c4 =(topGen ` ran((,)))
  ⊣ c5 = ⋃ c1
  ⊣ c0 = { s0 ∈ c5 | c2[<](c3 ` s0)}
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈(c1[Cn]c4))
} = {
  eqeltrrd(c0, c1, (`' c3 "(c2[(,)]+∞)), w0)
  syl6eqr((`' c3 "(c2[(,)]+∞)), c0, { s0 ∈ c5 | c2[<](c3 ` s0)}, w0)
  eqrd(s0, (`' c3 "(c2[(,)]+∞)), { s0 ∈ c5 | c2[<](c3 ` s0)}, w0)
  nfima(s0, `' c3, (c2[(,)]+∞))
  nfcnv(s0, c3)
  nfov(s0, c2, cioo, cpnf)
  nfcv(s0, cioo)
  nfcv(s0, cpnf)
  nfrab1(s0, c5, c2[<](c3 ` s0))
  3bitr4d(w0, s0 ∈(`' c3 "(c2[(,)]+∞)), s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c5 | c2[<](c3 ` s0)}, (s0 ∈ c5 ∧(c3 ` s0)∈(c2[(,)]+∞)), (s0 ∈ c5 ∧ c2[<](c3 ` s0)))

  syldan(w0, s0 ∈ c5, ((c3 ` s0)∈(c2[(,)]+∞)↔ c2[<](c3 ` s0)), (c3 ` s0)∈ ℝ)

  sylanblrc(w0, c1 ∈(TopOn ` c5), c1 ∈ Top, c5 = ⋃ c1)

blocks.name: ubelsupr
blocks.content: If U belongs to A and U is an upper bound, then U is the sup of A. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm ubelsupr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), wceq(c1, csup(c0, cr, clt)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  mpbir2and(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), wceq(c1, csup(c0, cr, clt)), wbr(c1, cle, csup(c0, cr, clt)), wbr(csup(c0, cr, clt), cle, c1))
  syl2anc(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), wbr(c1, cle, csup(c0, cr, clt)), w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(hs0, cr, wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0))))), wcel(c1, c0))
  suprub(hs0, s0, c0, c1)
  mpbird(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), wbr(csup(c0, cr, clt), cle, c1), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), wb(wbr(csup(c0, cr, clt), cle, c1), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(hs0, cr, wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0))))), wcel(c1, cr))
  suprleub(hs0, s0, s0, c0, c1)
  letri3d(c1, csup(c0, cr, clt), w3a(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))))
  syl(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), wcel(csup(c0, cr, clt), cr), w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(hs0, cr, wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0))))))
  3jca(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(hs0, cr, wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)))))
  ne0d(c0, c1, w3a(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))))
  syl2anc(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), wrex(hs0, cr, wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c1, cr), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))
  sseldd(c1, cr, c0, w3a(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))))
  simp1(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))
  simp2(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))
  simp3(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))
  brralrspcev(s0, hs0, c1, cr, c0, cv(s0), cle)
  suprcl(hs0, s0, c0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(cle)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: fsumcnf
blocks.content: A finite sum of functions to complex numbers from a common topological space is continuous, without disjoint var constraint x ph. The class expression for B normally contains free variables k and x to index it. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumcnf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), co(c3, ccn, c4)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co(c3, ccn, c4)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl5eqel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), co(c3, ccn, c4), cmpt(hs0, c0, csu(s1, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))), w0)
  cbvmpt(s0, hs0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2), csu(s1, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)))
  nfcv(hs0, csu(s1, c1, c2))
  nfsum(s0, s1, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))
  nfcv(s0, c1)
  sumeq2sdv(s1, c1, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  fsumcn(hs0, s1, c0, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), c3, c4, w0)
  syl5eqelr(cmpt(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)), co(c3, ccn, c4), cmpt(s0, c0, c2), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1)))
  cbvmpt(s0, hs0, c0, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))
  nfcv(hs0, c2)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(csu(s1, c1, c2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fsumcnf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ sum(s1 ∈ c1, c2))∈(c3[Cn]c4))
  ⊣ c4 =(TopOpen ` CCfld)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈(TopOn ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)→(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)∈(c3[Cn]c4))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl5eqel((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ sum(s1 ∈ c1, c2)), (c3[Cn]c4), (hs0 ∈ c0 ↦ sum(s1 ∈ c1,[hs0 / s0]c2)), w0)
  cbvmpt(s0, hs0, c0, sum(s1 ∈ c1, c2), sum(s1 ∈ c1,[hs0 / s0]c2))
  nfcv(hs0, sum(s1 ∈ c1, c2))
  nfsum(s0, s1, c1, [hs0 / s0]c2)
  nfcv(s0, c1)
  sumeq2sdv(s1, c1, c2, [hs0 / s0]c2, s0 = hs0)
  fsumcn(hs0, s1, c0, c1, [hs0 / s0]c2, c3, c4, w0)
  syl5eqelr((hs0 ∈ c0 ↦[hs0 / s0]c2), (c3[Cn]c4), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))
  cbvmpt(s0, hs0, c0, c2, [hs0 / s0]c2)
  nfcv(hs0, c2)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c2)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(sum(s1 ∈ c1, c2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)

blocks.name: mulltgt0
blocks.content: The product of a negative and a positive number is negative. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm mulltgt0(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))), wbr(co(c0, cmul, c1), clt, nat0))
} = {
  mpbird(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))), wbr(co(c0, cmul, c1), clt, nat0), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(co(c0, cmul, c1))))
  breqtrd(nat0, clt, cneg(co(c0, cmul, c1)), co(cneg(c0), cmul, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))))
  syl21anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))), wbr(nat0, clt, co(cneg(c0), cmul, c1)), wcel(cneg(c0), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wcel(cneg(c0), cr))
  renegcl(c0)
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0)))
  biimpa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0)))
  lt0neg1(c0)
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)))
  mulgt0(cneg(c0), c1)
  mulneg1d(c0, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wcel(c0, cc))
  recn(c0)
  ad2antrl(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1), wcel(c1, cc))
  recn(c1)
  lt0neg1d(co(c0, cmul, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))))
  ad2ant2r(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cr))

blocks.name: rspcegf
blocks.content: A version of ~ rspcev using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm rspcegf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w0), wrex(s0, c1, w1))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
} = {
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w0), wrex(s0, c1, w1), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1)))
  anabsi5(wcel(c0, c1), w0, wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1)))
  spcegf(s0, c0, c1, wa(wcel(c0, c1), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1))
  nfan(s0, wcel(c0, c1), w0)
  nfel(s0, c0, c1)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1, wcel(c0, c1), w0)
  eleq1(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  df-rex(s0, c1, w1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rspcegf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ w0)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c1, w1))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c1)
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 →(w1 ↔ w0))
} = {
  sylibr((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ w0), ∃(s0 ∈ c1, w1), ∃(s0,(s0 ∈ c1 ∧ w1)))
  anabsi5(c0 ∈ c1, w0, ∃(s0,(s0 ∈ c1 ∧ w1)))
  spcegf(s0, c0, c1, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ w0), (s0 ∈ c1 ∧ w1))
  nfan(s0, c0 ∈ c1, w0)
  nfel(s0, c0, c1)
  anbi12d(s0 = c0, s0 ∈ c1, w1, c0 ∈ c1, w0)
  eleq1(s0, c0, c1)
  df-rex(s0, c1, w1)
}

blocks.name: fcnre
blocks.content: A function continuous with respect to the standard topology, is a real mapping. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm fcnre(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, cr))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wceq(c1, cuni(c3))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c3, ccn, c2))

} = {
  syl3anc(w0, wf(c0, c1, cr), wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, cr)), wcel(c0, co(c3, ccn, c2)))
  sylib(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c3, ctop))
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, ctop), wcel(c0, co(c3, ccn, c2)))
  cntop1(c0, c3, c2)
  toptopon(c3, c1)
  a1i(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, cr)))
  eqeltri(c2, cfv(ctopon, cr), cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  retopon()
  syl6eleq(c0, co(c3, ccn, c2), c4, w0)

}
blocks.pretty:
thm fcnre(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 : c1 → ℝ))
  ⊣ c2 =(topGen ` ran((,)))
  ⊣ c1 = ⋃ c3
  ⊣ c4 =(c3[Cn]c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
} = {
  syl3anc(w0, (c0 : c1 → ℝ), c3 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c2 ∈(TopOn ` ℝ), c0 ∈(c3[Cn]c2))
  sylib(w0, c3 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c3 ∈ Top)
  syl(w0, c3 ∈ Top, c0 ∈(c3[Cn]c2))
  cntop1(c0, c3, c2)
  toptopon(c3, c1)
  a1i(w0, c2 ∈(TopOn ` ℝ))
  eqeltri(c2, (TopOn ` ℝ), (topGen ` ran((,))))
  retopon()
  syl6eleq(c0, (c3[Cn]c2), c4, w0)

blocks.name: sumsnd
blocks.content: A sum of a singleton is the term. The deduction version of ~ sumsn . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm sumsnd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, csn(c0), c1), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c2))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqtrd(csu(s0, csn(c0), c1), c2, cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, csn(cop(nat1, c2))), nat1), w0)
  syl5eq(csu(s0, csn(c0), c1), cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, csn(cop(nat1, c2))), nat1), csu(hs0, csn(c0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), w0)
  cbvsumi(s0, hs0, csn(c0), c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  fsum(hs0, hs1, csn(c0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csn(cop(nat1, c2)), nat1, csn(cop(nat1, c0)), csb(s0, cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), cv(hs1)), c1), w0)
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), cv(hs1)), c1)
  a1i(w0, wcel(nat1, cn))
  sylibr(w0, wf1o(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), co(nat1, cfz, nat1), csn(c0)), wf1o(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), csn(nat1), csn(c0)))

blocks.content: A version of ~ evth using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)

thm evthf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))))
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| wnfc(s1, c1)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wceq(c0, cuni(c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, ccmp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))))), wnf(s0, w0))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))))), wnf(s1, w0))
  sylib(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))), wrex(hs1, c0, wral(hs0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))))))
  evth(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  bitri(wrex(hs1, c0, wral(hs0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))))), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))), wrex(hs1, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))))))
  rexbii(hs1, c0, wral(hs0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))), wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))))
  cbvralf(hs0, s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))))
  nfcv(hs0, c0)
  nfbr(s1, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))
  nffv(s1, c1, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s1, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s1, cle)
  nffv(s1, c1, cv(hs1))
  nfcv(s1, cv(hs1))
  nfv(hs0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))))
  breq1d(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), cfv(c1, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(s1), c1)
  cbvrexf(hs1, s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))), wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))))
  nfcv(hs1, c0)
  nfral(s0, s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))))
  nfbr(s0, cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))
  nffv(s0, c1, cv(s1))
  nfcv(s0, cv(s1))
  nfcv(s0, cle)
  nffv(s0, c1, cv(hs1))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs1))
  nfv(hs1, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))))
  ralbidv(s1, c0, wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  breq2d(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), cfv(c1, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s0)))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), cv(s0), c1)

  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)

thm evthf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s1)[≤](c1 ` s0))))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c1)
  ⊣ F/(s1, c1)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ c0 = ⋃ c2
  ⊣ c3 =(topGen ` ran((,)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ Comp)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈(c2[Cn]c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ≠ ∅)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s1)[≤](c1 ` s0)))), F/(s0, w0))
  a1ii((w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s1)[≤](c1 ` s0)))), F/(s1, w0))
  sylib(w0, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s1)[≤](c1 ` s0))), ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0)[≤](c1 ` hs1))))
  evth(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  bitri(∃(hs1 ∈ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0)[≤](c1 ` hs1))), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s1)[≤](c1 ` s0))), ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s1)[≤](c1 ` hs1))))
  rexbii(hs1, c0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0)[≤](c1 ` hs1)), ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s1)[≤](c1 ` hs1)))
  cbvralf(hs0, s1, c0, (c1 ` hs0)[≤](c1 ` hs1), (c1 ` s1)[≤](c1 ` hs1))
  nfcv(hs0, c0)
  nfbr(s1, (c1 ` hs0), cle, (c1 ` hs1))
  nffv(s1, c1, hs0)
  nfcv(s1, hs0)
  nfcv(s1, cle)
  nffv(s1, c1, hs1)
  nfcv(s1, hs1)
  nfv(hs0, (c1 ` s1)[≤](c1 ` hs1))
  breq1d((c1 ` hs0), cle, (c1 ` hs1), (c1 ` s1), hs0 = s1)
  fveq2(hs0, s1, c1)
  cbvrexf(hs1, s0, c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s1)[≤](c1 ` hs1)), ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s1)[≤](c1 ` s0)))
  nfcv(hs1, c0)
  nfral(s0, s1, c0, (c1 ` s1)[≤](c1 ` hs1))
  nfbr(s0, (c1 ` s1), cle, (c1 ` hs1))
  nffv(s0, c1, s1)
  nfcv(s0, s1)
  nfcv(s0, cle)
  nffv(s0, c1, hs1)
  nfcv(s0, hs1)
  nfv(hs1, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s1)[≤](c1 ` s0)))
  ralbidv(s1, c0, hs1 = s0, (c1 ` s1)[≤](c1 ` hs1), (c1 ` s1)[≤](c1 ` s0))
  breq2d((c1 ` s1), cle, (c1 ` hs1), (c1 ` s0), hs1 = s0)
  fveq2(hs1, s0, c1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cle.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w((c1 ` s1)[≤](c1 ` hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)

  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)

blocks.name: cnfex
blocks.content: The class of continuous functions between two topologies is a set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnfex(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wcel(co(c0, ccn, c1), universe))
} = {
  eqeltrd(co(c0, ccn, c1), universe, crab(hs0, co(cuni(c1), cmap, cuni(c0)), wral(hs1, c1, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), c0))), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop), wceq(co(c0, ccn, c1), crab(hs0, co(cuni(c1), cmap, cuni(c0)), wral(hs1, c1, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), c0)))), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c1))))
  sylibr(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c0))))
  jctr(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c0)))
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  istopon(c0, cuni(c0))
  sylibr(wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c1))), wa(wcel(c1, ctop), wceq(cuni(c1), cuni(c1))))
  jctr(wcel(c1, ctop), wceq(cuni(c1), cuni(c1)))
  eqid(cuni(c1))
  istopon(c1, cuni(c1))
  cnfval(hs0, hs1, c0, cuni(c0), c1, cuni(c1))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wcel(crab(hs0, co(cuni(c1), cmap, cuni(c0)), wral(hs1, c1, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), c0))), universe), wcel(co(cuni(c1), cmap, cuni(c0)), universe))
  eqeltrd(co(cuni(c1), cmap, cuni(c0)), universe, cab(hs0, wf(cv(hs0), cuni(c0), cuni(c1))), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)))
  syl2anr(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop), wceq(co(cuni(c1), cmap, cuni(c0)), cab(hs0, wf(cv(hs0), cuni(c0), cuni(c1)))), wcel(cuni(c1), universe), wcel(cuni(c0), universe))
  mapvalg(hs0, cuni(c1), universe, cuni(c0), universe)
  syl2an(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(cab(hs0, wf(cv(hs0), cuni(c0), cuni(c1))), universe), wcel(cuni(c0), universe), wcel(cuni(c1), universe))
  uniexg(c0, ctop)
  uniexg(c1, ctop)
  mapex(hs0, cuni(c0), universe, cuni(c1), universe)
  rabexg(hs0, co(cuni(c1), cmap, cuni(c0)), universe, wral(hs1, c1, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), c0)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cuni(c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cuni(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(co(cuni(c1), cmap, cuni(c0)))
}

thm cnfex(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ Top)→(c0[Cn]c1)∈ 𝕌)
} = {
  eqeltrd((c0[Cn]c1), universe, { hs0 ∈(⋃ c1[↦]⋃ c0)| ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(`' hs0 " hs1)∈ c0)}, (c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ Top))
  syl2an(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ Top, (c0[Cn]c1)= { hs0 ∈(⋃ c1[↦]⋃ c0)| ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(`' hs0 " hs1)∈ c0)}, c0 ∈(TopOn ` ⋃ c0), c1 ∈(TopOn ` ⋃ c1))
  sylibr(c0 ∈ Top, c0 ∈(TopOn ` ⋃ c0), (c0 ∈ Top ∧ ⋃ c0 = ⋃ c0))
  jctr(c0 ∈ Top, ⋃ c0 = ⋃ c0)
  eqid(⋃ c0)
  istopon(c0, ⋃ c0)
  sylibr(c1 ∈ Top, c1 ∈(TopOn ` ⋃ c1), (c1 ∈ Top ∧ ⋃ c1 = ⋃ c1))
  jctr(c1 ∈ Top, ⋃ c1 = ⋃ c1)
  eqid(⋃ c1)
  istopon(c1, ⋃ c1)
  cnfval(hs0, hs1, c0, ⋃ c0, c1, ⋃ c1)
  syl((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ Top), { hs0 ∈(⋃ c1[↦]⋃ c0)| ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(`' hs0 " hs1)∈ c0)} ∈ 𝕌, (⋃ c1[↦]⋃ c0)∈ 𝕌)
  eqeltrd((⋃ c1[↦]⋃ c0), universe, { hs0 |(hs0 : ⋃ c0 → ⋃ c1)}, (c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ Top))
  syl2anr(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ Top, (⋃ c1[↦]⋃ c0)= { hs0 |(hs0 : ⋃ c0 → ⋃ c1)}, ⋃ c1 ∈ 𝕌, ⋃ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  mapvalg(hs0, ⋃ c1, universe, ⋃ c0, universe)
  syl2an(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ Top, { hs0 |(hs0 : ⋃ c0 → ⋃ c1)} ∈ 𝕌, ⋃ c0 ∈ 𝕌, ⋃ c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  uniexg(c0, ctop)
  uniexg(c1, ctop)
  mapex(hs0, ⋃ c0, universe, ⋃ c1, universe)
  rabexg(hs0, (⋃ c1[↦]⋃ c0), universe, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(`' hs0 " hs1)∈ c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(⋃ c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(⋃ c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(⋃ c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(⋃ c1)
  diff.hs0.c((⋃ c1[↦]⋃ c0))
}

blocks.name: fnchoice
blocks.content: For a finite set, a choice function exists, without using the axiom of choice. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm fnchoice(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wex(s0, wa(wfn(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)

blocks.name: refsumcn
blocks.content: A finite sum of continuous real functions, from a common topological space, is continuous. The class expression for B normally contains free variables k and x to index it. See ~ fsumcn for the analogous theorem on continuous complex functions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)

blocks.pretty:
thm refsumcn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ sum(s1 ∈ c1, c2))∈(c3[Cn]c4))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ c4 =(topGen ` ran((,)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈(TopOn ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)→(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)∈(c3[Cn]c4))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ sum(s1 ∈ c1, c2))∈(c3[Cn]c4)), d(s0, c3))
  syl6eleqr((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ sum(s1 ∈ c1, c2)), (c3[Cn]c4), (c3[Cn]((TopOpen ` CCfld)[|`t]ℝ)), w0)
  mpbid(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ sum(s1 ∈ c1, c2))∈(c3[Cn]((TopOpen ` CCfld)[|`t]ℝ)), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ sum(s1 ∈ c1, c2))∈(c3[Cn](TopOpen ` CCfld)))
  fsumcnf(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, (TopOpen ` CCfld), w0)
  mpbird((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)∈(c3[Cn](TopOpen ` CCfld)), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)∈(c3[Cn]((TopOpen ` CCfld)[|`t]ℝ)))
  syl6eleq((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2), (c3[Cn]((TopOpen ` CCfld)[|`t]ℝ)), (c3[Cn]c4), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))
  syl3anc((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)∈(c3[Cn](TopOpen ` CCfld))↔(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)∈(c3[Cn]((TopOpen ` CCfld)[|`t]ℝ))), (TopOpen ` CCfld)∈(TopOn ` ℂ), ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2))⊆ ℝ, ℝ ⊆ ℂ)
  a1i((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), (TopOpen ` CCfld)∈(TopOn ` ℂ))
  frnd((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2), cr, c0, (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))

blocks.name: rfcnpre2
blocks.content: If ` F ` is a continuous function with respect to the standard topology, then the preimage A of the values smaller than a given extended real ` B ` , is an open set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm rfcnpre2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {

  elioomnf(c2, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))
  3syl(w0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c3), co(cmnf, cioo, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), co(cmnf, cioo, c2)))), wf(c3, c5, cr), wfn(c3, c5))

blocks.name: cncmpmax

blocks.name: sumpair
blocks.content: Sum of two distinct complex values. The class expression for ` A ` and ` B ` normally contain free variable ` k ` to index it. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm sumpair(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, cpr(c0, c1), c2), co(c3, caddc, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(c2, c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(csu(s0, cpr(c0, c1), c2), co(c3, caddc, c4), co(csu(s0, csn(c0), c2), caddc, csu(s0, csn(c1), c2)), w0)
  fsumsplit(s0, cpr(c0, c1), c2, csn(c0), csn(c1), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cin(csn(c0), csn(c1)), emptycls), wne(c0, c1))
  disjsn2(c0, c1)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cun(csn(c0), csn(c1))))
  df-pr(c0, c1)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cpr(c0, c1), cfn))
  prfi(c0, c1)
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cpr(c0, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wo(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c1)))
  elpri(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  jaodan(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c2, cc))
  eqeltrd(c2, cc, c3, wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c3, cc))
  eqeltrd(c2, cc, c4, wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c4, cc))
  oveq12d(csu(s0, csn(c0), c2), caddc, csu(s0, csn(c1), c2), c3, c4, w0)
  sumsnd(s0, c0, c2, c3, c5, w0)
  sumsnd(s0, c1, c2, c4, c6, w0)
  nfv(s0, w0)
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sumpair(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ { c0, c1 }, c2)=(c3[+]c4))
  ⊣ (w0 → F/(s0, c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → F/(s0, c4))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ≠ c1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 = c0)→ c2 = c3)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 = c1)→ c2 = c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(sum(s0 ∈ { c0, c1 }, c2), (c3[+]c4), (sum(s0 ∈ { c0 }, c2)[+]sum(s0 ∈ { c1 }, c2)), w0)
  fsumsplit(s0, { c0, c1 }, c2, { c0 }, { c1 }, w0)
  syl(w0, ({ c0 } ⋂ { c1 })= ∅, c0 ≠ c1)
  disjsn2(c0, c1)
  a1i(w0, { c0, c1 } =({ c0 } ⋃ { c1 }))
  df-pr(c0, c1)
  a1i(w0, { c0, c1 } ∈ Fin)
  prfi(c0, c1)
  sylan2(w0, s0 ∈ { c0, c1 }, c2 ∈ ℂ, (s0 = c0 ∨ s0 = c1))
  elpri(s0, c0, c1)
  jaodan(w0, s0 = c0, s0 = c1, c2 ∈ ℂ)
  eqeltrd(c2, cc, c3, (w0 ∧ s0 = c0))
  adantr(w0, s0 = c0, c3 ∈ ℂ)
  eqeltrd(c2, cc, c4, (w0 ∧ s0 = c1))
  adantr(w0, s0 = c1, c4 ∈ ℂ)
  oveq12d(sum(s0 ∈ { c0 }, c2), caddc, sum(s0 ∈ { c1 }, c2), c3, c4, w0)
  sumsnd(s0, c0, c2, c3, c5, w0)
  sumsnd(s0, c1, c2, c4, c6, w0)
  nfv(s0, w0)
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
}

blocks.name: refsum2cnlem1

blocks.name: refsum2cn
blocks.content: The sum of two continuus real functions (from a common topological space) is continuous. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)

thm elabrexg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c1, cab(s1, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  syl6eleqr(c1, cab(s1, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1))), cab(s1, wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, c2)))
  mpbird(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c1, cab(s1, wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))))), wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))))
  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, c2), wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))))
  mpan2(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))), wtru)
  tru()
  rspcev(hs0, cv(s0), c0, wtru, wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))
  2thd(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), wtru)
  equcoms(hs0, s0, wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))
  trud(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  adantl(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, c2), wb(wcel(c1, cab(s1, wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))))), wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))))
  elabg(s1, c1, c2, wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))), wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))))
  rexbidv(hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))
  eqeq1(cv(s1), c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  abbii(s1, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))))
  cbvrex(s0, hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))
  nfv(hs0, wceq(cv(s1), c1))
  nfeq2(s0, cv(s1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  eqeq2d(cv(s1), c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.wrex.s(s1, hs0, c0, wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  diff.csb.s(s1, s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(s1), c1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

blocks.pretty:
thm elabrexg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c1 ∈ { s1 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, s1 = c1)})
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  syl6eleqr(c1, { s1 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, s1 = c1)}, { s1 | ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, s1 =[hs0 / s0]c1)}, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  mpbird((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c1 ∈ { s1 | ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, s1 =[hs0 / s0]c1)}, ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, c1 =[hs0 / s0]c1))
  adantr(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c2, ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, c1 =[hs0 / s0]c1))
  mpan2(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, c1 =[hs0 / s0]c1), wtru)
  tru()
  rspcev(hs0, s0, c0, wtru, c1 =[hs0 / s0]c1)
  2thd(hs0 = s0, c1 =[hs0 / s0]c1, wtru)
  equcoms(hs0, s0, c1 =[hs0 / s0]c1)
  trud(hs0 = s0)
  adantl(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c2, (c1 ∈ { s1 | ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, s1 =[hs0 / s0]c1)} ↔ ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, c1 =[hs0 / s0]c1)))
  elabg(s1, c1, c2, ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, s1 =[hs0 / s0]c1), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, c1 =[hs0 / s0]c1))
  rexbidv(hs0, c0, s1 = c1, s1 =[hs0 / s0]c1, c1 =[hs0 / s0]c1)
  eqeq1(s1, c1, [hs0 / s0]c1)
  abbii(s1, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, s1 = c1), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, s1 =[hs0 / s0]c1))
  cbvrex(s0, hs0, c0, s1 = c1, s1 =[hs0 / s0]c1)
  nfv(hs0, s1 = c1)
  nfeq2(s0, s1, [hs0 / s0]c1)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c1)
  eqeq2d(s1, c1, [hs0 / s0]c1, s0 = hs0)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.wrex.s(s1, hs0, c0, c1 =[hs0 / s0]c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, c1, [hs0 / s0]c1)
  diff.csb.s(s1, s0, hs0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(s1 = c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

  neqned(c0, c0p, w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cz)), wcel(c1, cn0), wne(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c1), nat0)))
  pm2.65da(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cz)), wcel(c1, cn0), wne(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c1), nat0)), wceq(c0, c0p), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c1), nat0))
  3ad2antl2(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cz)), wcel(c1, cn0), wne(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c1), nat0), wceq(c0, c0p), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c1), nat0))

  adantl(wcel(c1, cn0), wceq(c0, c0p), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c1), cfv(cxp(cn0, csn(nat0)), c1)))
  fveq1d(cfv(ccoe, c0), c1, cxp(cn0, csn(nat0)), wceq(c0, c0p))
  eqtrd(cfv(ccoe, c0), cxp(cn0, csn(nat0)), cfv(ccoe, c0p), wceq(c0, c0p))
  fveq2(c0, c0p, ccoe)
  a1i(wceq(c0, c0p), wceq(cfv(ccoe, c0p), cxp(cn0, csn(nat0))))
  coe0()
  adantr(wcel(c1, cn0), wceq(c0, c0p), wceq(cfv(cxp(cn0, csn(nat0)), c1), nat0))

  adantr(wne(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c1), nat0), wceq(c0, c0p), wn(wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c1), nat0)))

thm n0p(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(Poly ` ℤ)∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0 ∧((coeff ` c0)` c1)≠ 0)→ c0 ≠ 0p)
} = {
  neqned(c0, c0p, (c0 ∈(Poly ` ℤ)∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0 ∧((coeff ` c0)` c1)≠ 0))
  pm2.65da((c0 ∈(Poly ` ℤ)∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0 ∧((coeff ` c0)` c1)≠ 0), c0 = 0p, ((coeff ` c0)` c1)= 0)
  3ad2antl2(c0 ∈(Poly ` ℤ), c1 ∈ ℕ0, ((coeff ` c0)` c1)≠ 0, c0 = 0p, ((coeff ` c0)` c1)= 0)
  eqtrd(((coeff ` c0)` c1), nat0, ((ℕ0 × { 0 })` c1), (c1 ∈ ℕ0 ∧ c0 = 0p))
  adantl(c1 ∈ ℕ0, c0 = 0p, ((coeff ` c0)` c1)=((ℕ0 × { 0 })` c1))
  fveq1d((coeff ` c0), c1, (ℕ0 × { 0 }), c0 = 0p)
  eqtrd((coeff ` c0), (ℕ0 × { 0 }), (coeff ` 0p), c0 = 0p)
  fveq2(c0, c0p, ccoe)
  a1i(c0 = 0p, (coeff ` 0p)=(ℕ0 × { 0 }))
  coe0()
  adantr(c1 ∈ ℕ0, c0 = 0p, ((ℕ0 × { 0 })` c1)= 0)
  syl(c1 ∈ ℕ0, ((ℕ0 × { 0 })` c1)= 0, c1 ∈ ℕ0)
  id(c1 ∈ ℕ0)
  fvconst2(c1, cn0, nat0)
  c0ex()
  3ad2antl3(c0 ∈(Poly ` ℤ), c1 ∈ ℕ0, ((coeff ` c0)` c1)≠ 0, c0 = 0p, ¬((coeff ` c0)` c1)= 0)
  adantr(((coeff ` c0)` c1)≠ 0, c0 = 0p, ¬((coeff ` c0)` c1)= 0)

  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cpw(c0), cfn), wcel(c0, cpw(c0)))

  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cpw(c0), cfn), wral(hs0, cpw(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn)))

blocks.name: ssinss1d

blocks.name: 0un

blocks.name: elpwinss

blocks.name: unidmex
blocks.content: If ` F ` is a set, then ` U. dom F ` is a set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: zenom

blocks.name: disjiun2
blocks.content: In a disjoint collection, an indexed union is disjoint from an additional term. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm disjiun2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cin(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2), emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wdisj(s0, c3, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cdif(c3, c0)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c4), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  eqtr3d(cin(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2), emptycls, cin(ciun(s0, c0, c1), ciun(s0, csn(c4), c1)), w0)
  ineq2d(ciun(s0, c0, c1), ciun(s0, csn(c4), c1), c2, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(ciun(s0, csn(c4), c1), c2), wcel(c4, cdif(c3, c0)))
  iunxsng(s0, c4, cdif(c3, c0), c1, c2)
  syl13anc(w0, wceq(cin(ciun(s0, c0, c1), ciun(s0, csn(c4), c1)), emptycls), wdisj(s0, c3, c1), wss(c0, c3), wss(csn(c4), c3), wceq(cin(c0, csn(c4)), emptycls))
  3syl(w0, wss(csn(c4), c3), wcel(c4, cdif(c3, c0)), wcel(c4, c3))
  eldifi(c4, c3, c0)
  snssi(c4, c3)
  sylibr(w0, wceq(cin(c0, csn(c4)), emptycls), wn(wcel(c4, c0)))
  eldifbd(c4, c0, c3, w0)
  disjsn(c0, c4)
  disjiun(s0, c3, c1, c0, csn(c4))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm disjiun2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)⋂ c2)= ∅)
  ⊣ (w0 → ⊔(s0 ∈ c3, c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈(c3 \ c0))
  ⊣ (s0 = c4 → c1 = c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  eqtr3d((⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)⋂ c2), emptycls, (⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)⋂ ⋃(s0 ∈ { c4 }, c1)), w0)
  ineq2d(⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1), ⋃(s0 ∈ { c4 }, c1), c2, w0)
  syl(w0, ⋃(s0 ∈ { c4 }, c1)= c2, c4 ∈(c3 \ c0))
  iunxsng(s0, c4, (c3 \ c0), c1, c2)
  syl13anc(w0, (⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)⋂ ⋃(s0 ∈ { c4 }, c1))= ∅, ⊔(s0 ∈ c3, c1), c0 ⊆ c3, { c4 } ⊆ c3, (c0 ⋂ { c4 })= ∅)
  3syl(w0, { c4 } ⊆ c3, c4 ∈(c3 \ c0), c4 ∈ c3)
  eldifi(c4, c3, c0)
  snssi(c4, c3)
  sylibr(w0, (c0 ⋂ { c4 })= ∅, ¬ c4 ∈ c0)
  eldifbd(c4, c0, c3, w0)
  disjsn(c0, c4)
  disjiun(s0, c3, c1, c0, { c4 })
  diff.csn.s(s0, c4)
}

blocks.name: 0pwfi
blocks.content: The empty set is in any power set, and it's finite. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: iunxsngf2
blocks.content: A singleton index picks out an instance of an indexed union's argument. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm iunxsngf2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(ciun(s0, csn(c0), c2), c3))
  -| wnfc(s0, c3)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, ciun(s0, csn(c0), c2), c3, wcel(c0, c1))
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(s0, csn(c0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wrex(s0, csn(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  eliun(s0, cv(hs0), csn(c0), c2)
  rexsngf(s0, c0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c3)
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), c2, c3, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  diff.hs0.c(ciun(s0, csn(c0), c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iunxsngf2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → ⋃(s0 ∈ { c0 }, c2)= c3)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c3)
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 → c2 = c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, ⋃(s0 ∈ { c0 }, c2), c3, c0 ∈ c1)
  syl5bb(c0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ ⋃(s0 ∈ { c0 }, c2), hs0 ∈ c3, ∃(s0 ∈ { c0 }, hs0 ∈ c2))
  eliun(s0, hs0, { c0 }, c2)
  rexsngf(s0, c0, c1, hs0 ∈ c2, hs0 ∈ c3)
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c3)
  eleq2d(hs0, c2, c3, s0 = c0)
  diff.hs0.c(⋃(s0 ∈ { c0 }, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: pwfin0
blocks.content: A finite set always belongs to a power class. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: uzct
blocks.content: An upper integer set is countable. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm uzct(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wbr(c0, cdom, com)
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c1))
} = {
  mp2an(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wbr(c0, cdom, cz), wbr(cz, cdom, com))
  ax-mp(wbr(c0, cdom, cz), wss(c0, cz))
  eqsstri(c0, cz, cfv(cuz, c1))
  uzssz(c1)
  ax-mp(wi(wss(c0, cz), wbr(c0, cdom, cz)), wcel(cz, universe))
  zex()
  ssdomg(cz, universe, c0)
  zct()
  domtr(c0, cz, com)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm uzct(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ c0[≼]_om
  ⊣ c0 =(ℤ≥ ` c1)
} = {
  mp2an(c0[≼]_om, c0[≼]ℤ, ℤ[≼]_om)
  ax-mp(c0[≼]ℤ, c0 ⊆ ℤ)
  eqsstri(c0, cz, (ℤ≥ ` c1))
  uzssz(c1)
  ax-mp((c0 ⊆ ℤ → c0[≼]ℤ), ℤ ∈ 𝕌)
  zex()
  ssdomg(cz, universe, c0)
  zct()
  domtr(c0, cz, com)
}

blocks.name: fiiuncl
blocks.content: If a set is closed under the union of two sets, then it is closed under finite indexed union. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: iunp1
blocks.content: The addition of the next set to a union indexed by a finite set of sequential integers. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

} = {

blocks.name: fiunicl
blocks.content: If a set is closed under the union of two sets, then it is closed under finite union. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm fiunicl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cuni(c0), c0))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl5eqel(cuni(c0), c0, ciun(hs0, c0, cv(hs0)), w0)
  uniiun(hs0, c0)
  fiiuncl(hs0, s0, s1, c0, cv(hs0), c0, w0)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

thm fiunicl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ⋃ c0 ∈ c0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)→(s0 ⋃ s1)∈ c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)

} = {

  ⊢ (w0 → ⊔(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 × c2)))
  ⊣ (w0 → ⊔(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {

  adantl((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0)), hs0 = hs1, (hs0 = hs1 ∨([hs0 / s0](c1 × c2)⋂[hs1 / s0](c1 × c2))= ∅))

  syl2anc(((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0))∧ ¬ hs0 = hs1), (hs0 = hs1 ∨([hs0 / s0](c1 × c2)⋂[hs1 / s0](c1 × c2))= ∅), (w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0)), hs0 ≠ hs1)
  simpl((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0)), ¬ hs0 = hs1)
  adantl((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0)), ¬ hs0 = hs1, hs0 ≠ hs1)
  neqne(hs0, hs1)
  syl(((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0))∧ hs0 ≠ hs1), (hs0 = hs1 ∨([hs0 / s0](c1 × c2)⋂[hs1 / s0](c1 × c2))= ∅), ([hs0 / s0](c1 × c2)⋂[hs1 / s0](c1 × c2))= ∅)
  eqtrd(([hs0 / s0](c1 × c2)⋂[hs1 / s0](c1 × c2)), emptycls, (([hs0 / s0]c1 ×[hs0 / s0]c2)⋂([hs1 / s0]c1 ×[hs1 / s0]c2)), ((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0))∧ hs0 ≠ hs1))
  a1i(((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0))∧ hs0 ≠ hs1), ([hs0 / s0](c1 × c2)⋂[hs1 / s0](c1 × c2))=(([hs0 / s0]c1 ×[hs0 / s0]c2)⋂([hs1 / s0]c1 ×[hs1 / s0]c2)))
  ineq12i([hs0 / s0](c1 × c2), [hs1 / s0](c1 × c2), ([hs0 / s0]c1 ×[hs0 / s0]c2), ([hs1 / s0]c1 ×[hs1 / s0]c2))
  csbxp(s0, hs0, c1, c2)
  csbxp(s0, hs1, c1, c2)
  syl(((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0))∧ hs0 ≠ hs1), (([hs0 / s0]c1 ×[hs0 / s0]c2)⋂([hs1 / s0]c1 ×[hs1 / s0]c2))= ∅, ([hs0 / s0]c1 ⋂[hs1 / s0]c1)= ∅)
  sylc(((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0))∧ hs0 ≠ hs1), ([hs0 / s0]c1 ⋂[hs1 / s0]c1)= ∅, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0)∧ hs1 ∈ c0), ¬ hs0 = hs1)

  simpll(w0, (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0), hs0 ≠ hs1)
  simplrl(w0, hs0 ∈ c0, hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 ≠ hs1)
  simplrr(w0, hs0 ∈ c0, hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 ≠ hs1)
  neneqd(hs0, hs1, ((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0))∧ hs0 ≠ hs1))

  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((c1 × c2))
  diff.hs1.c((c1 × c2))
}

blocks.name: eliind
blocks.content: Membership in indexed intersection. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 24-Dec-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm eliind(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c2, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c4), wb(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c0, c1)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c4, c2), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c0, c3)))
  mpbid(w0, wral(s0, c2, wcel(c0, c3)), wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c2, c3)))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c2, c3)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c0, c3))), wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c2, c3)))
  eliin(s0, c0, ciin(s0, c2, c3), c2, c3)
  rspcva(s0, c4, c2, wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eliind(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c2, c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (s0 = c4 →(c0 ∈ c3 ↔ c0 ∈ c1))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, c0 ∈ c1, c4 ∈ c2, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c0 ∈ c3))
  mpbid(w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c0 ∈ c3), c0 ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c2, c3))
  syl(w0, (c0 ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c2, c3)↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c0 ∈ c3)), c0 ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c2, c3))
  eliin(s0, c0, ⋂(s0 ∈ c2, c3), c2, c3)
  rspcva(s0, c4, c2, c0 ∈ c3, c0 ∈ c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: ixpssmapc
blocks.content: An infinite Cartesian product is a subset of set exponentiation. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 24-Dec-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm ixpssmapc(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(cixp(s0, c0, c1), co(c2, cmap, c0)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wss(c1, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  sstrd(cixp(s0, c0, c1), co(c2, cmap, c0), co(ciun(s0, c0, c1), cmap, c0), w0)
  syl(w0, wss(cixp(s0, c0, c1), co(ciun(s0, c0, c1), cmap, c0)), wcel(ciun(s0, c0, c1), universe))
  ssexd(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2, c3, w0)
  ixpssmap2g(s0, c0, c1, universe)
  syl2anc(w0, wss(co(ciun(s0, c0, c1), cmap, c0), co(c2, cmap, c0)), wcel(c2, c3), wss(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2))
  sylibr(w0, wss(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2), wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, w0, wss(c1, c2))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wss(c1, c2))
  iunss(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  mapss(c2, c3, ciun(s0, c0, c1), c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ixpssmapc(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ×(s0 ∈ c0, c1)⊆(c2[↦]c0))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ⊆ c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  sstrd(×(s0 ∈ c0, c1), (c2[↦]c0), (⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)[↦]c0), w0)
  syl(w0, ×(s0 ∈ c0, c1)⊆(⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)[↦]c0), ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈ 𝕌)
  ssexd(⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1), c2, c3, w0)
  ixpssmap2g(s0, c0, c1, universe)
  syl2anc(w0, (⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)[↦]c0)⊆(c2[↦]c0), c2 ∈ c3, ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)⊆ c2)
  sylibr(w0, ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)⊆ c2, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, w0, c1 ⊆ c2)
  ex(w0, s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2)
  iunss(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  mapss(c2, c3, ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1), c0)
}

blocks.name: elintd
blocks.content: Membership in class intersection. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Jan-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm elintd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cint(c1)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c0, cv(s0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wcel(c0, cint(c1)), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c0, cv(s0))))
  ralrimi(s0, c1, w0, wcel(c0, cv(s0)))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c0, cv(s0)))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cint(c1)), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c0, cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, c2))
  elintg(s0, c0, c2, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elintd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ ⋂ c1)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ c0 ∈ s0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, c0 ∈ ⋂ c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c0 ∈ s0))
  ralrimi(s0, c1, w0, c0 ∈ s0)
  ex(w0, s0 ∈ c1, c0 ∈ s0)
  syl(w0, (c0 ∈ ⋂ c1 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c0 ∈ s0)), c0 ∈ c2)
  elintg(s0, c0, c2, c1)
}

blocks.name: snelmap
blocks.content: Membership of the element in the range of a constant map. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm snelmap(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c1, emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cxp(c1, csn(cv(s0))), co(c0, cmap, c1)))
} = {
  mpd(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  sylib(w0, wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wne(c1, emptycls))
  n0(hs0, c1)
  exlimdv(hs0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  eqeltrd(cv(s0), c0, cfv(cxp(c1, csn(cv(s0))), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cxp(c1, csn(cv(s0))), cv(hs0))))
  eqcomd(cv(s0), cfv(cxp(c1, csn(cv(s0))), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  fvconst2(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0))
  vex(s0)
  ffvelrnd(cxp(c1, csn(cv(s0))), cv(hs0), c0, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wf(cxp(c1, csn(cv(s0))), c1, c0))
  mpbid(w0, wf(cxp(c1, csn(cv(s0))), c1, c0), wcel(cxp(c1, csn(cv(s0))), co(c0, cmap, c1)))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(cxp(c1, csn(cv(s0))), co(c0, cmap, c1)), wf(cxp(c1, csn(cv(s0))), c1, c0)), wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c1, c2))
  elmapg(c0, c3, c1, c2, cxp(c1, csn(cv(s0))))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cv(s0), c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm snelmap(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → s0 ∈ c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ≠ ∅)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 × { s0 })∈(c0[↦]c1))
} = {
  mpd(w0, s0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs0, hs0 ∈ c1))
  sylib(w0, ∃(hs0, hs0 ∈ c1), c1 ≠ ∅)
  n0(hs0, c1)
  exlimdv(hs0, w0, hs0 ∈ c1, s0 ∈ c0)
  ex(w0, hs0 ∈ c1, s0 ∈ c0)
  eqeltrd(s0, c0, ((c1 × { s0 })` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1))
  adantl(w0, hs0 ∈ c1, s0 =((c1 × { s0 })` hs0))
  eqcomd(s0, ((c1 × { s0 })` hs0), hs0 ∈ c1)
  fvconst2(hs0, c1, s0)
  vex(s0)
  ffvelrnd((c1 × { s0 }), hs0, c0, c1, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c1, ((c1 × { s0 }): c1 → c0))
  mpbid(w0, ((c1 × { s0 }): c1 → c0), (c1 × { s0 })∈(c0[↦]c1))
  syl2anc(w0, ((c1 × { s0 })∈(c0[↦]c1)↔((c1 × { s0 }): c1 → c0)), c0 ∈ c3, c1 ∈ c2)
  elmapg(c0, c3, c1, c2, (c1 × { s0 }))
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(s0 ∈ c0)
}

blocks.name: nelrnmpt
blocks.content: Non-membership in the range of a function in maps-to notaion. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm nelrnmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wn(wcel(c0, crn(c1))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wne(c0, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  mtbird(w0, wcel(c0, crn(c1)), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(c0, c3)))
  sylib(w0, wn(wrex(s0, c2, wceq(c0, c3))), wral(s0, c2, wn(wceq(c0, c3))))
  ralrimi(s0, c2, w0, wn(wceq(c0, c3)))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wn(wceq(c0, c3)))
  neneqd(c0, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  ralnex(s0, c2, wceq(c0, c3))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c0, crn(c1)), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(c0, c3))), wcel(c0, c4))
  elrnmpt(s0, c0, c4, c1, c2, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nelrnmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ¬ c0 ∈ ran(c1))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→ c0 ≠ c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  mtbird(w0, c0 ∈ ran(c1), ∃(s0 ∈ c2, c0 = c3))
  sylib(w0, ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, c0 = c3), ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ¬ c0 = c3))
  ralrimi(s0, c2, w0, ¬ c0 = c3)
  ex(w0, s0 ∈ c2, ¬ c0 = c3)
  neneqd(c0, c3, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  ralnex(s0, c2, c0 = c3)
  syl(w0, (c0 ∈ ran(c1)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, c0 = c3)), c0 ∈ c4)
  elrnmpt(s0, c0, c4, c1, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: iunssf

blocks.origin:
thm iunssf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wss(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2), wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)))
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
} = {
  3bitri(wss(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2), wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wss(cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), c2), wal(hs0, wi(wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  sseq1i(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2, cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  df-iun(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  abss(hs0, c2, wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  3bitrri(wal(hs0, wi(wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wral(s0, c0, wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))), wal(hs0, wral(s0, c0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))))
  ralbii(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  dfss2(hs0, c1, c2)
  ralcom4(s0, hs0, c0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  albii(hs0, wral(s0, c0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wi(wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  r19.23(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iunssf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)⊆ c2 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c2)
} = {
  3bitri(⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)⊆ c2, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2), { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)} ⊆ c2, ∀(hs0,(∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)→ hs0 ∈ c2)))
  sseq1i(⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1), c2, { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)})
  df-iun(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  abss(hs0, c2, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1))
  3bitrri(∀(hs0,(∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)→ hs0 ∈ c2)), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ c1 → hs0 ∈ c2))), ∀(hs0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ c1 → hs0 ∈ c2))))
  ralbii(s0, c0, c1 ⊆ c2, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ c1 → hs0 ∈ c2)))
  dfss2(hs0, c1, c2)
  ralcom4(s0, hs0, c0, (hs0 ∈ c1 → hs0 ∈ c2))
  albii(hs0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ c1 → hs0 ∈ c2)), (∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)→ hs0 ∈ c2))
  r19.23(s0, c0, hs0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c2)
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: ssinc

blocks.origin:
thm ssinc(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, c1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cfzo, c2))), wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)

  sylc(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), w3a(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c1, cle, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c2))), w0)
  jca(w0, wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), w3a(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c1, cle, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c2)))
  jca(w0, wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz))
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, c1)))
  eluzel2(c2, c1)
  3jca(w0, wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c1, cle, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c2))
  syl(w0, wbr(c1, cle, c2), wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, c1)))
  eluzle(c2, c1)

blocks.name: ssdec

thm ssdec(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c2)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c2, cfzo, c1))), wss(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpcom(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), w3a(wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c2, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c1))))
  jca(w0, wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), w3a(wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c2, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c1)))
  jca(w0, wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz))
  syl(w0, wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c2)))
  eluzel2(c1, c2)
  3jca(w0, wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c2, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c1))
  syl(w0, wbr(c2, cle, c1), wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c2)))
  eluzle(c1, c2)
  leidd(c1, w0)
  zred(c1, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c2)))
  eluzelz(c1, c2)
  fzind(hs0, s0, c2, c1, c1, wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2))), wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, c2))), wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, c2))), wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, c2))), wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cfv(c0, c2))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, c2)), wss(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, c2)))
  sseq1d(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c2, c0)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, c2)), wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, c2)))
  sseq1d(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c0)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, c2)), wss(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cfv(c0, c2)))
  sseq1d(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c0)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, c2)), wss(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2)))
  sseq1d(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c1, c0)
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c2, cle, c1)), wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, c2))))
  ssidd(cfv(c0, c2), w0)
  3exp(wa(wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, c2))), w0, wss(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cfv(c0, c2)))
  sstrd(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), w3a(wa(wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, c2))), w0))
  3adant2(wa(wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, c2))), w0, wss(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), w0), wss(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cfv(c0, cv(s0))), w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c2, cfzo, c1)))
  simpr(wa(wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), w0)
  sylibr(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), w0), wcel(cv(s0), co(c2, cfzo, c1)), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c2)), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1)))
  3jca(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), w0), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c2)), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))
  sylibr(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), w0), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c2)), w3a(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0))))
  3jca(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), w0), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)))
  simplll(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1)), w0)
  simplr1(wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1), w0)
  simplr2(wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1), w0)
  eluz2(cv(s0), c2)
  simpllr(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1)), w0)
  simplr3(wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1), w0)
  elfzo2(cv(s0), c2, c1)
  3adant1(wa(wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))), wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, c2))), w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, c2)))
  syl2anc(wa(wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, c2))), w0), wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, c2)), w0, wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, c2))))
  simpr(wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, c2))), w0)
  simpl(wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, c2))), w0)
  pm3.35(w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2))))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, c2))))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, c2))))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cfv(c0, c2))))
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, c2)))
  diff.wss.s(s0, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, c2))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)

blocks.name: elixpconstg
blocks.content: Membership in an infinite Cartesian product of a constant ` B ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 8-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm elixpconstg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, cixp(s0, c2, c3)), wf(c0, c2, c3)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  impbid(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cixp(s0, c2, c3)), wf(c0, c2, c3))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wcel(c0, cixp(s0, c2, c3)), wf(c0, c2, c3)))
  sylibr(wcel(c0, cixp(s0, c2, c3)), wf(c0, c2, c3), wa(wfn(c0, c2), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c3))))
  jca(wcel(c0, cixp(s0, c2, c3)), wfn(c0, c2), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c3)))
  simp2bi(wcel(c0, cixp(s0, c2, c3)), wfn(c0, c2), wcel(c0, universe), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c3)))
  simp3bi(wcel(c0, cixp(s0, c2, c3)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c3)), wcel(c0, universe), wfn(c0, c2))
  ex(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c0, c2, c3), wcel(c0, cixp(s0, c2, c3)))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c0, c2, c3)), wcel(c0, cixp(s0, c2, c3)), w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wfn(c0, c2), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c3))))
  3jca(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c0, c2, c3)), wcel(c0, universe), wfn(c0, c2), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c3)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c0, c2, c3), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c0, c2, c3), wfn(c0, c2))
  ffn(c0, c2, c3)
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c0, c2, c3), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c3)))
  simprbi(wf(c0, c2, c3), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c3)), wfn(c0, c2))
  ffnfv(s0, c0, c2, c3)
  elixp2(s0, c0, c2, c3)
}

thm ballss3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(co(c0, cfv(cbl, c1), c2), c3))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cpsmet, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4), wbr(co(c0, c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, wss(co(c0, cfv(cbl, c1), c2), c3), wral(s0, co(c0, cfv(cbl, c1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  ralrimi(s0, co(c0, cfv(cbl, c1), c2), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfv(cbl, c1), c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfv(cbl, c1), c2))), wcel(cv(s0), c3), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4), wbr(co(c0, c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2))
  simpl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfv(cbl, c1), c2)))
  simpld(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfv(cbl, c1), c2))), wcel(cv(s0), c4), wbr(co(c0, c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2))
  simprd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfv(cbl, c1), c2))), wbr(co(c0, c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2), wcel(cv(s0), c4))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfv(cbl, c1), c2))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wbr(co(c0, c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfv(cbl, c1), c2)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfv(cbl, c1), c2)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfv(cbl, c1), c2)), wb(wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfv(cbl, c1), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wbr(co(c0, c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2))))
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfv(cbl, c1), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wbr(co(c0, c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2))), wcel(c1, cfv(cpsmet, c4)), wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c2, cxr))
  elblps(c1, c4, c0, c2, cv(s0))
  dfss3(s0, co(c0, cfv(cbl, c1), c2), c3)

  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbl, c1)

blocks.pretty:
thm ballss3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[(ball ` c1)]c2)⊆ c3)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈(PsMet ` c4))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c4 ∧(c0[c1]s0)[<]c2)→ s0 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, (c0[(ball ` c1)]c2)⊆ c3, ∀(s0 ∈(c0[(ball ` c1)]c2), s0 ∈ c3))
  ralrimi(s0, (c0[(ball ` c1)]c2), w0, s0 ∈ c3)
  ex(w0, s0 ∈(c0[(ball ` c1)]c2), s0 ∈ c3)
  syl3anc((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[(ball ` c1)]c2)), s0 ∈ c3, w0, s0 ∈ c4, (c0[c1]s0)[<]c2)
  simpl(w0, s0 ∈(c0[(ball ` c1)]c2))
  simpld((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[(ball ` c1)]c2)), s0 ∈ c4, (c0[c1]s0)[<]c2)
  simprd((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[(ball ` c1)]c2)), (c0[c1]s0)[<]c2, s0 ∈ c4)
  mpbid((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[(ball ` c1)]c2)), (s0 ∈ c4 ∧(c0[c1]s0)[<]c2), s0 ∈(c0[(ball ` c1)]c2))
  simpr(w0, s0 ∈(c0[(ball ` c1)]c2))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈(c0[(ball ` c1)]c2), (s0 ∈(c0[(ball ` c1)]c2)↔(s0 ∈ c4 ∧(c0[c1]s0)[<]c2)))
  syl3anc(w0, (s0 ∈(c0[(ball ` c1)]c2)↔(s0 ∈ c4 ∧(c0[c1]s0)[<]c2)), c1 ∈(PsMet ` c4), c0 ∈ c4, c2 ∈ ℝ*)
  elblps(c1, c4, c0, c2, s0)
  dfss3(s0, (c0[(ball ` c1)]c2), c3)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, (ball ` c1), c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbl, c1)
  diff.cbl.s(s0)
}

  -| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), w4)))

  -| diffsw(s1, w2)
} = {
  mpd(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wa(w1, w2)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wa(w3, w4))))
  sylibr(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wa(w3, w4))), wa(wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), w3)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), w4))))

  adantll(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wa(w3, w4)), wa(w1, w2))

  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wa(w3, w4)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, cv(s0))))
  3syl(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cz))
  biimpi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c1)))

thm cbvmpt22(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)=(s0 ∈ c0, s2 ∈ c1 ↦ c3)
  ⊣ F/(s1, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s2, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s2, c2)
  ⊣ F/(s1, c3)
  ⊣ (s1 = s2 → c2 = c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  3eqtr4i((s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), (s0 ∈ c0, s2 ∈ c1 ↦ c3), { < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > |((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 = c2)}, { < < s0, s2 >, hs0 > |((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s2 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 = c3)})
  cbvoprab2(s0, s1, hs0, s2, ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 = c2), ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s2 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 = c3))
  nfan(s2, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), hs0 = c2)
  nfan(s2, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1)
  nfcri(s2, s0, c0)
  nfcri(s2, s1, c1)
  nfcv(s2, c1)
  nfeq2(s2, hs0, c2)
  nfan(s1, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s2 ∈ c1), hs0 = c3)
  nfan(s1, s0 ∈ c0, s2 ∈ c1)
  nfcri(s1, s0, c0)
  nfv(s1, s2 ∈ c1)
  nfeq2(s1, hs0, c3)
  anbi12d(s1 = s2, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), hs0 = c2, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s2 ∈ c1), hs0 = c3)
  anbi2d(s1 = s2, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, s2 ∈ c1)
  eleq1w(s1, s2, c1)
  eqeq2d(hs0, c2, c3, s1 = s2)
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  df-mpo(s0, s2, hs0, c0, c1, c3)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

thm cbvmpt21(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cmpo(s2, s1, c0, c1, c3))
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| wnfc(s2, c1)
  -| wnfc(s2, c2)
  -| wnfc(s0, c3)

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cmpo(s2, s1, c0, c1, c3), coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), coprab(s2, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))))
  cbvoprab1(s0, s1, hs0, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)))
  nfan(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  nfan(s2, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  nfv(s2, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  nfcri(s2, s1, c1)
  nfeq2(s2, cv(hs0), c2)
  nfan(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  nfan(s0, wcel(cv(s2), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(s2), c0))
  nfel(s0, cv(s1), c1)
  nfcv(s0, cv(s1))
  nfeq2(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c0))
  eleq1w(s0, s2, c0)
  eqeq2d(cv(hs0), c2, c3, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))

  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s2), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

thm cbvmpt21(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)=(s2 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c3)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c1)
  ⊣ F/(s2, c1)
  ⊣ F/(s2, c2)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c3)
  ⊣ (s0 = s2 → c2 = c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
} = {
  3eqtr4i((s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), (s2 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c3), { < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > |((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 = c2)}, { < < s2, s1 >, hs0 > |((s2 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 = c3)})
  cbvoprab1(s0, s1, hs0, s2, ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 = c2), ((s2 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 = c3))
  nfan(s2, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), hs0 = c2)
  nfan(s2, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1)

  nfeq2(s2, hs0, c2)
  nfan(s0, (s2 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), hs0 = c3)
  nfan(s0, s2 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1)
  nfv(s0, s2 ∈ c0)
  nfel(s0, s1, c1)
  nfcv(s0, s1)
  nfeq2(s0, hs0, c3)
  anbi12d(s0 = s2, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), hs0 = c2, (s2 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), hs0 = c3)
  anbi1d(s0 = s2, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, s2 ∈ c0)
  eleq1w(s0, s2, c0)
  eqeq2d(hs0, c2, c3, s0 = s2)
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  df-mpo(s2, s1, hs0, c0, c1, c3)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)

  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

thm eliuniin(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, c2), wrex(s0, c3, wral(s1, c4, wcel(c0, c5)))))
  -| wceq(c2, ciun(s0, c3, ciin(s1, c4, c5)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  impbid2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2), wrex(s0, c3, wral(s1, c4, wcel(c0, c5))))
  mpd(wcel(c0, c2), wrex(s0, c3, wral(s1, c4, wcel(c0, c5))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(c0, ciin(s1, c4, c5))))
  sylbb(wcel(c0, c2), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(c0, ciin(s1, c4, c5))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c3, ciin(s1, c4, c5))))
  reximdv(s0, c3, wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c0, ciin(s1, c4, c5)), wral(s1, c4, wcel(c0, c5)))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c2), wi(wcel(c0, ciin(s1, c4, c5)), wral(s1, c4, wcel(c0, c5))))
  ibi(wcel(c0, ciin(s1, c4, c5)), wral(s1, c4, wcel(c0, c5)))
  eliin(s1, c0, ciin(s1, c4, c5), c4, c5)
  rexlimdv3a(s0, c3, wcel(c0, c1), wral(s1, c4, wcel(c0, c5)), wcel(c0, c2))
  sylibr(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wral(s1, c4, wcel(c0, c5))), wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c3, ciin(s1, c4, c5))))
  sylibr(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wral(s1, c4, wcel(c0, c5))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c3, ciin(s1, c4, c5))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(c0, ciin(s1, c4, c5))))
  3imp3i2an(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wral(s1, c4, wcel(c0, c5)), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(c0, ciin(s1, c4, c5))), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(c0, ciin(s1, c4, c5)))
  simp2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wral(s1, c4, wcel(c0, c5)))
  biimpar(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s1, c4, wcel(c0, c5)), wcel(c0, ciin(s1, c4, c5)))
  eliin(s1, c0, c1, c4, c5)
  rspe(s0, c3, wcel(c0, ciin(s1, c4, c5)))
  eliun(s0, c0, c3, ciin(s1, c4, c5))
  eleq2i(c0, c2, ciun(s0, c3, ciin(s1, c4, c5)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
}
