thm eliin2f(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wb(wcel(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2))))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(wne(c0, emptycls), wb(wcel(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2))), wcel(c1, universe))
  adantl(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, universe), wb(wcel(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2))))
  eliin(s0, c1, universe, c0, c2)
  2falsed(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, universe))), wcel(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)))
  adantl(wne(c0, emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, universe)), wn(wcel(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2))))
  prcnel(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2))
  sylib(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, universe))), wn(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2))), wrex(s0, c0, wn(wcel(c1, c2))))
  sylibr(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, universe))), wrex(s0, c0, wn(wcel(c1, c2))), wrex(hs0, c0, wn(wcel(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)))))
  sylibr(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, universe))), wrex(hs0, c0, wn(wcel(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)))), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))))))
  mpd(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, universe))), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))))), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  adantr(wne(c0, emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, universe)), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  biimpi(wne(c0, emptycls), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  n0(hs0, c0)
  eximdv(hs0, wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, universe))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)))))
  ancld(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, universe))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))))
  adantl(wne(c0, emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, universe)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)))))
  a1d(wn(wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))))
  prcnel(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))
  df-rex(hs0, c0, wn(wcel(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))))
  cbvrexf(s0, hs0, c0, wn(wcel(c1, c2)), wn(wcel(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))))
  nfcv(hs0, c0)
  nfv(hs0, wn(wcel(c1, c2)))
  nfn(s0, wcel(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)))
  nfel2(s0, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  notbid(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)))
  eleq2d(c1, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  rexnal(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, universe))))
  diff.hs0.w(wn(wcel(c1, c2)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eliin2f(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ≠ ∅ →(c1 ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c2)↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c2)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(c0 ≠ ∅, (c1 ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c2)↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c2)), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  adantl(c0 ≠ ∅, c1 ∈ 𝕌, (c1 ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c2)↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c2)))
  eliin(s0, c1, universe, c0, c2)
  2falsed((c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌), c1 ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c2), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c2))
  adantl(c0 ≠ ∅, ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌, ¬ c1 ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c2))
  prcnel(c1, ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c2))
  sylib((c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌), ¬ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c2), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ¬ c1 ∈ c2))
  sylibr((c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ¬ c1 ∈ c2), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, ¬ c1 ∈[hs0 / s0]c2))
  sylibr((c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, ¬ c1 ∈[hs0 / s0]c2), ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ ¬ c1 ∈[hs0 / s0]c2)))
  mpd((c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌), ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ ¬ c1 ∈[hs0 / s0]c2)), ∃(hs0, hs0 ∈ c0))
  adantr(c0 ≠ ∅, ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌, ∃(hs0, hs0 ∈ c0))
  biimpi(c0 ≠ ∅, ∃(hs0, hs0 ∈ c0))
  n0(hs0, c0)
  eximdv(hs0, (c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌), hs0 ∈ c0, (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ ¬ c1 ∈[hs0 / s0]c2))
  ancld((c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌), hs0 ∈ c0, ¬ c1 ∈[hs0 / s0]c2)
  adantl(c0 ≠ ∅, ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌, (hs0 ∈ c0 → ¬ c1 ∈[hs0 / s0]c2))
  a1d(¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌, hs0 ∈ c0, ¬ c1 ∈[hs0 / s0]c2)
  prcnel(c1, [hs0 / s0]c2)
  df-rex(hs0, c0, ¬ c1 ∈[hs0 / s0]c2)
  cbvrexf(s0, hs0, c0, ¬ c1 ∈ c2, ¬ c1 ∈[hs0 / s0]c2)
  nfcv(hs0, c0)
  nfv(hs0, ¬ c1 ∈ c2)
  nfn(s0, c1 ∈[hs0 / s0]c2)
  nfel2(s0, c1, [hs0 / s0]c2)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c2)
  notbid(s0 = hs0, c1 ∈ c2, c1 ∈[hs0 / s0]c2)
  eleq2d(c1, c2, [hs0 / s0]c2, s0 = hs0)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c2)
  rexnal(s0, c0, c1 ∈ c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌))
  diff.hs0.w(¬ c1 ∈ c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: nssd
blocks.content: Negation of subclass relationship. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm nssd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wn(wss(c0, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c2, c1)))
} = {
  sylibr(w0, wn(wss(c0, c1)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))))
  sylc(w0, wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))), wcel(c2, c0), wa(wcel(c2, c0), wn(wcel(c2, c1))))
  jca(w0, wcel(c2, c0), wn(wcel(c2, c1)))
  spcegv(hs0, c2, c0, wa(wcel(c2, c0), wn(wcel(c2, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wn(wcel(c2, c1)))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c2, c0)
  notbid(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c2, c1))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c2, c1)
  nss(hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c2, c0), wn(wcel(c2, c1))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nssd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ¬ c0 ⊆ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → ¬ c2 ∈ c1)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, ¬ c0 ⊆ c1, ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ c1)))
  sylc(w0, ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ c1)), c2 ∈ c0, (c2 ∈ c0 ∧ ¬ c2 ∈ c1))
  jca(w0, c2 ∈ c0, ¬ c2 ∈ c1)
  spcegv(hs0, c2, c0, (c2 ∈ c0 ∧ ¬ c2 ∈ c1), (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ c1))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c2, hs0 ∈ c0, ¬ hs0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0, ¬ c2 ∈ c1)
  eleq1(hs0, c2, c0)
  notbid(hs0 = c2, hs0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c1)
  eleq1(hs0, c2, c1)
  nss(hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c2 ∈ c0 ∧ ¬ c2 ∈ c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: iineq12dv
blocks.content: Equality deduction for indexed intersection. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

blocks.name: supxrcld
blocks.content: The supremum of an arbitrary set of extended reals is an extended real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

blocks.name: elrestd
blocks.content: A sufficient condition for being an open set of a subspace topology. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm elrestd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, crest, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c1))
  -| wceq(c0, cin(c5, c2))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, crest, c2)), wrex(hs0, c1, wceq(c0, cin(cv(hs0), c2))))
  syl2anc(w0, wrex(hs0, c1, wceq(c0, cin(cv(hs0), c2))), wcel(c5, c1), wceq(c0, cin(c5, c2)))
  a1i(w0, wceq(c0, cin(c5, c2)))
  rspceeqv(hs0, c5, c1, c0, cin(c5, c2), cin(cv(hs0), c2))
  ineq1(cv(hs0), c5, c2)
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, crest, c2)), wrex(hs0, c1, wceq(c0, cin(cv(hs0), c2)))), wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c4))
  elrest(hs0, c1, c3, c2, c4, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(c5, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elrestd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈(c1[|`t]c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ c0 =(c5 ⋂ c2)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, c0 ∈(c1[|`t]c2), ∃(hs0 ∈ c1, c0 =(hs0 ⋂ c2)))
  syl2anc(w0, ∃(hs0 ∈ c1, c0 =(hs0 ⋂ c2)), c5 ∈ c1, c0 =(c5 ⋂ c2))
  a1i(w0, c0 =(c5 ⋂ c2))
  rspceeqv(hs0, c5, c1, c0, (c5 ⋂ c2), (hs0 ⋂ c2))
  ineq1(hs0, c5, c2)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ∈(c1[|`t]c2)↔ ∃(hs0 ∈ c1, c0 =(hs0 ⋂ c2))), c1 ∈ c3, c2 ∈ c4)
  elrest(hs0, c1, c3, c2, c4, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((c5 ⋂ c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: eliuniincex
blocks.content: Counterexample to show that the additional conditions in ~ eliuniin and ~ eliuniin2 are actually needed. Notice that the definition of ` A ` is not even needed (it can be any class). (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm eliuniincex(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wn(wb(wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c3, wcel(c0, c4)))))
  -| wceq(c2, csn(emptycls))
  -| wceq(c3, emptycls)
  -| wceq(c4, emptycls)
  -| wceq(c0, universe)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  mp2an(wn(wb(wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c3, wcel(c0, c4))))), wn(wcel(c0, c1)), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c3, wcel(c0, c4))))
  eqneltri(c0, c1, universe)
  nvel(c1)
  mp2an(wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c3, wcel(c0, c4))), wcel(emptycls, c2), wral(s1, emptycls, wcel(c0, c4)))
  eleqtrri(emptycls, c2, csn(emptycls))
  snid(emptycls)
  0ex()
  ral0(s1, wcel(c0, c4))
  rspce(s0, emptycls, c2, wral(s1, emptycls, wcel(c0, c4)), wral(s1, c3, wcel(c0, c4)))
  nfral(s0, s1, emptycls, wcel(c0, c4))
  nfel(s0, c0, c4)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcxfr(s0, c4, emptycls)
  nfcv(s0, emptycls)
  a1i(wceq(cv(s0), emptycls), wb(wral(s1, c3, wcel(c0, c4)), wral(s1, emptycls, wcel(c0, c4))))
  raleqi(s1, c3, emptycls, wcel(c0, c4))
  sylibr(wa(wn(wcel(c0, c1)), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c3, wcel(c0, c4)))), wn(wb(wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c3, wcel(c0, c4))))), wo(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c3, wcel(c0, c4))))), wa(wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c3, wcel(c0, c4))), wn(wcel(c0, c1)))))
  olcd(wa(wn(wcel(c0, c1)), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c3, wcel(c0, c4)))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c3, wcel(c0, c4))))), wa(wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c3, wcel(c0, c4))), wn(wcel(c0, c1))))
  pm3.22(wn(wcel(c0, c1)), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c3, wcel(c0, c4))))
  xor(wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c3, wcel(c0, c4))))
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.emptycls.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eliuniincex(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ¬(c0 ∈ c1 ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c3, c0 ∈ c4)))
  ⊣ c2 = { ∅ }
  ⊣ c3 = ∅
  ⊣ c4 = ∅
  ⊣ c0 = 𝕌
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  mp2an(¬(c0 ∈ c1 ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c3, c0 ∈ c4))), ¬ c0 ∈ c1, ∃(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c3, c0 ∈ c4)))
  eqneltri(c0, c1, universe)
  nvel(c1)
  mp2an(∃(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c3, c0 ∈ c4)), ∅ ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ ∅, c0 ∈ c4))
  eleqtrri(emptycls, c2, { ∅ })
  snid(emptycls)
  0ex()
  ral0(s1, c0 ∈ c4)
  rspce(s0, emptycls, c2, ∀(s1 ∈ ∅, c0 ∈ c4), ∀(s1 ∈ c3, c0 ∈ c4))
  nfral(s0, s1, emptycls, c0 ∈ c4)
  nfel(s0, c0, c4)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcxfr(s0, c4, emptycls)
  nfcv(s0, emptycls)
  a1i(s0 = ∅, (∀(s1 ∈ c3, c0 ∈ c4)↔ ∀(s1 ∈ ∅, c0 ∈ c4)))
  raleqi(s1, c3, emptycls, c0 ∈ c4)
  sylibr((¬ c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c3, c0 ∈ c4))), ¬(c0 ∈ c1 ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c3, c0 ∈ c4))), ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c3, c0 ∈ c4)))∨(∃(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c3, c0 ∈ c4))∧ ¬ c0 ∈ c1)))
  olcd((¬ c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c3, c0 ∈ c4))), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c3, c0 ∈ c4))), (∃(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c3, c0 ∈ c4))∧ ¬ c0 ∈ c1))
  pm3.22(¬ c0 ∈ c1, ∃(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c3, c0 ∈ c4)))
  xor(c0 ∈ c1, ∃(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c3, c0 ∈ c4)))
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.emptycls.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: eliincex
blocks.content: Counterexample to show that the additional conditions in ~ eliin and ~ eliin2 are actually needed. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm eliincex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wn(wb(wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2)), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c0, c2))))
  -| wceq(c0, universe)
  -| wceq(c1, emptycls)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wn(wb(wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2)), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c0, c2)))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  mp2an(wn(wb(wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2)), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c0, c2)))), wn(wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2))), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c0, c2)))
  eqneltri(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2), universe)
  nvel(ciin(s0, c1, c2))
  mpbir(wral(s0, c1, wcel(c0, c2)), wral(s0, emptycls, wcel(c0, c2)))
  ral0(s0, wcel(c0, c2))
  raleqi(s0, c1, emptycls, wcel(c0, c2))
  sylibr(wa(wn(wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2))), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c0, c2))), wn(wb(wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2)), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c0, c2)))), wo(wa(wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2)), wn(wral(s0, c1, wcel(c0, c2)))), wa(wral(s0, c1, wcel(c0, c2)), wn(wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2))))))
  olcd(wa(wn(wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2))), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c0, c2))), wa(wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2)), wn(wral(s0, c1, wcel(c0, c2)))), wa(wral(s0, c1, wcel(c0, c2)), wn(wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2)))))
  pm3.22(wn(wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2))), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c0, c2)))
  xor(wcel(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2)), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c0, c2)))
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}

  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3bitri(wss(c0, crab(s0, c1, w0)), wa(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, w0)), wss(c0, cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0))), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0))))
  sseq2i(c0, crab(s0, c1, w0), cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0)))
  df-rab(s0, c1, w0)
  ssabf(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0))
  3bitr2ri(wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0))), wa(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, w0)), wa(wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wral(s0, c0, w0)), wral(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0)))
  anbi1i(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, w0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  dfss3f(s0, c0, c1)
  r19.26(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0)
  df-ral(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0))

blocks.name: eliin2
blocks.content: Membership in indexed intersection. See ~ eliincex for a counterexample showing that the precondition ` B =/= (/) ` cannot be simply dropped. ~ eliin uses an alternative precondition (and it doesn't have a disjoint var constraint between ` B ` and ` x ` ; see ~ eliin2f ). (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

blocks.name: ssrab2f
blocks.content: Subclass relation for a restricted class. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

blocks.name: restuni3
blocks.content: The underlying set of a subspace induced by the subspace operator ` |``t ` . The result can be applied, for instance, to topologies and sigma-algebras. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm restuni3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cuni(co(c0, crest, c1)), cin(cuni(c0), c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
} = {
  eqelssd(hs0, cuni(co(c0, crest, c1)), cin(cuni(c0), c1), w0)
  sylibr(w0, wss(cuni(co(c0, crest, c1)), cin(cuni(c0), c1)), wral(hs0, cuni(co(c0, crest, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cuni(c0), c1))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cuni(co(c0, crest, c1)), w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cuni(c0), c1)))
  mpd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(co(c0, crest, c1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cuni(c0), c1)), wrex(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c1))))
  mpd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(co(c0, crest, c1)))), wrex(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c1))), wrex(hs2, co(c0, crest, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(co(c0, crest, c1))), wrex(hs2, co(c0, crest, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))
  biimpi(wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(co(c0, crest, c1))), wrex(hs2, co(c0, crest, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(co(c0, crest, c1))), wi(wrex(hs2, co(c0, crest, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), wrex(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c1)))))
  rexlimdv(hs2, co(c0, crest, c1), w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wrex(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c1))))
  3exp(w0, wcel(cv(hs2), co(c0, crest, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wrex(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c1))))
  mpd(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs2), co(c0, crest, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), wrex(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c1))), wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs2), cin(cv(hs1), c1))))
  3adant3(w0, wcel(cv(hs2), co(c0, crest, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs2), cin(cv(hs1), c1))))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs2), co(c0, crest, c1))), wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs2), cin(cv(hs1), c1))), wcel(cv(hs2), co(c0, crest, c1)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs2), co(c0, crest, c1)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs2), co(c0, crest, c1)), wb(wcel(cv(hs2), co(c0, crest, c1)), wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs2), cin(cv(hs1), c1)))))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(cv(hs2), co(c0, crest, c1)), wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs2), cin(cv(hs1), c1)))), wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c3))
  elrest(hs1, c0, c2, c1, c3, cv(hs2))
  reximdv(hs1, c0, w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs2), co(c0, crest, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs2), cin(cv(hs1), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c1)))
  3ad2ant3(w0, wcel(cv(hs2), co(c0, crest, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wi(wceq(cv(hs2), cin(cv(hs1), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c1))))
  ex(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs2), cin(cv(hs1), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c1)))
  eleqtrd(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c1), cv(hs2), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs2), cin(cv(hs1), c1))))
  simpl(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs2), cin(cv(hs1), c1)))
  simpr(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs2), cin(cv(hs1), c1)))
  rexlimdva(hs1, c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(co(c0, crest, c1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cuni(c0), c1)))
  adantl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(co(c0, crest, c1)))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cuni(c0), c1))))
  ex(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cuni(c0), c1)))
  elind(cv(hs0), cuni(c0), c1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c1))))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))
  adantl(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  elinel1(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c1)
  simpl(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c1)))
  elunii(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0)
  adantl(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  elinel2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c1)
  dfss3(hs0, cuni(co(c0, crest, c1)), cin(cuni(c0), c1))
  sylibr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cuni(c0), c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(co(c0, crest, c1))), wrex(hs2, co(c0, crest, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))

  simp3(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cuni(c0), c1))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))

thm restuni3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ⋃(c0[|`t]c1)=(⋃ c0 ⋂ c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c3)
} = {
  eqelssd(hs0, ⋃(c0[|`t]c1), (⋃ c0 ⋂ c1), w0)
  sylibr(w0, ⋃(c0[|`t]c1)⊆(⋃ c0 ⋂ c1), ∀(hs0 ∈ ⋃(c0[|`t]c1), hs0 ∈(⋃ c0 ⋂ c1)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, ⋃(c0[|`t]c1), w0, hs0 ∈(⋃ c0 ⋂ c1))
  mpd((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ⋃(c0[|`t]c1)), hs0 ∈(⋃ c0 ⋂ c1), ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈(hs1 ⋂ c1)))
  mpd((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ⋃(c0[|`t]c1)), ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈(hs1 ⋂ c1)), ∃(hs2 ∈(c0[|`t]c1), hs0 ∈ hs2))
  adantl(w0, hs0 ∈ ⋃(c0[|`t]c1), ∃(hs2 ∈(c0[|`t]c1), hs0 ∈ hs2))
  biimpi(hs0 ∈ ⋃(c0[|`t]c1), ∃(hs2 ∈(c0[|`t]c1), hs0 ∈ hs2))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ ⋃(c0[|`t]c1), (∃(hs2 ∈(c0[|`t]c1), hs0 ∈ hs2)→ ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈(hs1 ⋂ c1))))
  rexlimdv(hs2, (c0[|`t]c1), w0, hs0 ∈ hs2, ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈(hs1 ⋂ c1)))
  3exp(w0, hs2 ∈(c0[|`t]c1), hs0 ∈ hs2, ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈(hs1 ⋂ c1)))

  3adant3(w0, hs2 ∈(c0[|`t]c1), hs0 ∈ hs2, ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs2 =(hs1 ⋂ c1)))
  mpbid((w0 ∧ hs2 ∈(c0[|`t]c1)), ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs2 =(hs1 ⋂ c1)), hs2 ∈(c0[|`t]c1))
  simpr(w0, hs2 ∈(c0[|`t]c1))
  adantr(w0, hs2 ∈(c0[|`t]c1), (hs2 ∈(c0[|`t]c1)↔ ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs2 =(hs1 ⋂ c1))))
  syl2anc(w0, (hs2 ∈(c0[|`t]c1)↔ ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs2 =(hs1 ⋂ c1))), c0 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ c3)
  elrest(hs1, c0, c2, c1, c3, hs2)
  reximdv(hs1, c0, (w0 ∧ hs2 ∈(c0[|`t]c1)∧ hs0 ∈ hs2), hs2 =(hs1 ⋂ c1), hs0 ∈(hs1 ⋂ c1))
  3ad2ant3(w0, hs2 ∈(c0[|`t]c1), hs0 ∈ hs2, (hs2 =(hs1 ⋂ c1)→ hs0 ∈(hs1 ⋂ c1)))
  ex(hs0 ∈ hs2, hs2 =(hs1 ⋂ c1), hs0 ∈(hs1 ⋂ c1))
  eleqtrd(hs0, (hs1 ⋂ c1), hs2, (hs0 ∈ hs2 ∧ hs2 =(hs1 ⋂ c1)))
  simpl(hs0 ∈ hs2, hs2 =(hs1 ⋂ c1))
  simpr(hs0 ∈ hs2, hs2 =(hs1 ⋂ c1))
  rexlimdva(hs1, c0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ⋃(c0[|`t]c1)), hs0 ∈(hs1 ⋂ c1), hs0 ∈(⋃ c0 ⋂ c1))
  adantl((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ⋃(c0[|`t]c1)), hs1 ∈ c0, (hs0 ∈(hs1 ⋂ c1)→ hs0 ∈(⋃ c0 ⋂ c1)))
  ex(hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈(hs1 ⋂ c1), hs0 ∈(⋃ c0 ⋂ c1))
  elind(hs0, ⋃ c0, c1, (hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈(hs1 ⋂ c1)))

  elinel2(hs0, hs1, c1)
  dfss3(hs0, ⋃(c0[|`t]c1), (⋃ c0 ⋂ c1))
  sylibr((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(⋃ c0 ⋂ c1)), hs0 ∈ ⋃(c0[|`t]c1), ∃(hs2 ∈(c0[|`t]c1), hs0 ∈ hs2))
  mpd((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(⋃ c0 ⋂ c1)), ∃(hs2 ∈(c0[|`t]c1), hs0 ∈ hs2), ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ hs1))
  adantl(w0, hs0 ∈(⋃ c0 ⋂ c1), ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ hs1))
  sylib(hs0 ∈(⋃ c0 ⋂ c1), ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ hs1), hs0 ∈ ⋃ c0)
  elinel1(hs0, ⋃ c0, c1)
  eluni2(hs1, hs0, c0)
  rexlimdv(hs1, c0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(⋃ c0 ⋂ c1)), hs0 ∈ hs1, ∃(hs2 ∈(c0[|`t]c1), hs0 ∈ hs2))
  3exp((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(⋃ c0 ⋂ c1)), hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ hs1, ∃(hs2 ∈(c0[|`t]c1), hs0 ∈ hs2))
  syl2anc(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(⋃ c0 ⋂ c1))∧ hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ hs1), ∃(hs2 ∈(c0[|`t]c1), hs0 ∈ hs2), (hs1 ⋂ c1)∈(c0[|`t]c1), hs0 ∈(hs1 ⋂ c1))
  3adant1r(w0, hs0 ∈(⋃ c0 ⋂ c1), hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ hs1, (hs1 ⋂ c1)∈(c0[|`t]c1))
  3adant3(w0, hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ hs1, (hs1 ⋂ c1)∈(c0[|`t]c1))
  elrestd((hs1 ⋂ c1), c0, c1, c2, c3, hs1, (w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0))
  adantr(w0, hs1 ∈ c0, c0 ∈ c2)
  adantr(w0, hs1 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c3)
  simpr(w0, hs1 ∈ c0)
  eqid((hs1 ⋂ c1))
  syl2anc(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(⋃ c0 ⋂ c1))∧ hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ hs1), hs0 ∈(hs1 ⋂ c1), hs0 ∈ hs1, hs0 ∈ c1)
  simp3((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(⋃ c0 ⋂ c1)), hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ hs1)
  syl(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(⋃ c0 ⋂ c1))∧ hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ hs1), hs0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈(⋃ c0 ⋂ c1))
  simp1r(w0, hs0 ∈(⋃ c0 ⋂ c1), hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ hs1)
  elinel2(hs0, ⋃ c0, c1)
  elind(hs0, hs1, c1, (hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1))
  simpl(hs0 ∈ hs1, hs0 ∈ c1)
  simpr(hs0 ∈ hs1, hs0 ∈ c1)
  rspcev(hs2, (hs1 ⋂ c1), (c0[|`t]c1), hs0 ∈(hs1 ⋂ c1), hs0 ∈ hs2)
  eleq2(hs2, (hs1 ⋂ c1), hs0)
  eluni2(hs2, hs0, (c0[|`t]c1))
  diff.hs0.c(⋃(c0[|`t]c1))
  diff.hs0.c((⋃ c0 ⋂ c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.c(hs0)
  diff.hs2.c((c0[|`t]c1))
  diff.hs2.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.w(∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈(hs1 ⋂ c1)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)

blocks.name: eliuniin2
blocks.content: Indexed union of indexed intersections. See ~ eliincex for a counterexample showing that the precondition ` C =/= (/) ` cannot be simply dropped. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm eliuniin2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wb(wcel(c1, c2), wrex(s0, c3, wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c4)))))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wceq(c2, ciun(s0, c3, ciin(s1, c0, c4)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  impbid2(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, c2), wrex(s0, c3, wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c4))))
  mpd(wcel(c1, c2), wrex(s0, c3, wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c4))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(c1, ciin(s1, c0, c4))))
  sylbb(wcel(c1, c2), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(c1, ciin(s1, c0, c4))), wcel(c1, ciun(s0, c3, ciin(s1, c0, c4))))
  reximdv(s0, c3, wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, ciin(s1, c0, c4)), wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c4)))
  a1i(wcel(c1, c2), wi(wcel(c1, ciin(s1, c0, c4)), wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c4))))
  ibi(wcel(c1, ciin(s1, c0, c4)), wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c4)))
  eliin(s1, c1, ciin(s1, c0, c4), c0, c4)
  rexlimd(s0, c3, wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c4)), wcel(c1, c2))
  nfne(s0, c0, emptycls)
  nfcv(s0, emptycls)
  nfv(s0, wcel(c1, c2))
  3exp(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c4)), wcel(c1, c2))
  sylibr(w3a(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c4))), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, ciun(s0, c3, ciin(s1, c0, c4))))
  sylibr(w3a(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c4))), wcel(c1, ciun(s0, c3, ciin(s1, c0, c4))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(c1, ciin(s1, c0, c4))))
  3imp3i2an(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c4)), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(c1, ciin(s1, c0, c4))), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(c1, ciin(s1, c0, c4)))
  simp2(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c4)))
  biimpar(wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c4)), wcel(c1, ciin(s1, c0, c4)))
  eliin2(s1, c0, c1, c4)
  rspe(s0, c3, wcel(c1, ciin(s1, c0, c4)))
  eliun(s0, c1, c3, ciin(s1, c0, c4))
  eleq2i(c1, c2, ciun(s0, c3, ciin(s1, c0, c4)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c2)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: restuni4
blocks.content: The underlying set of a subspace induced by the ` |``t ` operator. The result can be applied, for instance, to topologies and sigma-algebras. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm restuni4(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cuni(co(c0, crest, c1)), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, cuni(c0)))
} = {
  3eqtr4rd(cuni(co(c0, crest, c1)), c1, cin(c1, cuni(c0)), cin(cuni(c0), c1), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cin(c1, cuni(c0)), cin(cuni(c0), c1)))
  incom(c1, cuni(c0))
  sylib(w0, wceq(c1, cin(c1, cuni(c0))), wss(c1, cuni(c0)))
  dfss(c1, cuni(c0))
  restuni3(c0, c1, c2, universe, w0)
  ssexd(c1, cuni(c0), universe, w0)
  uniexd(c0, c2, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm restuni4(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ⋃(c0[|`t]c1)= c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ⊆ ⋃ c0)
} = {
  3eqtr4rd(⋃(c0[|`t]c1), c1, (c1 ⋂ ⋃ c0), (⋃ c0 ⋂ c1), w0)
  a1i(w0, (c1 ⋂ ⋃ c0)=(⋃ c0 ⋂ c1))
  incom(c1, ⋃ c0)
  sylib(w0, c1 =(c1 ⋂ ⋃ c0), c1 ⊆ ⋃ c0)
  dfss(c1, ⋃ c0)
  restuni3(c0, c1, c2, universe, w0)
  ssexd(c1, ⋃ c0, universe, w0)
  uniexd(c0, c2, w0)
}

thm restuni6(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

  3eqtrd(cuni(co(c0, crest, c1)), cin(cuni(c0), c1), cuni(co(c0, crest, cin(c1, cuni(c0)))), cin(c1, cuni(c0)), w0)
  unieqd(co(c0, crest, c1), co(c0, crest, cin(c1, cuni(c0))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, crest, c1), co(c0, crest, cin(c1, cuni(c0)))), wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c3))
  restin(c0, c2, c1, c3, cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  restuni4(c0, cin(c1, cuni(c0)), c2, w0)

blocks.name: cbvrabv2
blocks.content: A more general version of ~ cbvrabv . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbvrabv2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wceq(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s1, c1, w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, c1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  cbvrabcsf(s0, s1, c0, c1, w0, w1)
  nfcv(s1, c0)
  nfcv(s0, c1)
  nfv(s1, w0)
  nfv(s0, w1)
}

blocks.name: iinssiin
blocks.content: Subset implication for an indexed intersection. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm iinssiin(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(ciin(s0, c0, c1), ciin(s0, c0, c2)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wss(c1, c2))
} = {
  sylibr(w0, wss(ciin(s0, c0, c1), ciin(s0, c0, c2)), wral(hs0, ciin(s0, c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c2))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, ciin(s0, c0, c1), w0, wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c2)))
  sylibr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c2)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c1)))
  nfel(s0, cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c1))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfii1(s0, c0, c1)
  ex(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c1))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  sseldd(cv(hs0), c2, c1, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c1))), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wss(c1, c2))
  adantll(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  eliinid(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c2)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  eliin(s0, cv(hs0), universe, c0, c2)
  dfss3(hs0, ciin(s0, c0, c1), ciin(s0, c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(ciin(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(ciin(s0, c0, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iinssiin(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1)⊆ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c2))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ⊆ c2)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1)⊆ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c2), ∀(hs0 ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1), hs0 ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c2)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1), w0, hs0 ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c2))
  sylibr((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1)), hs0 ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c2), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c2))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1)), hs0 ∈ c2)
  nfan(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
  nfel(s0, hs0, ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  nfii1(s0, c0, c1)
  ex((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1)), s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c2)
  sseldd(hs0, c2, c1, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1))∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  adantlr(w0, hs0 ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1), s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2)
  adantll(w0, hs0 ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1), s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  eliinid(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  ax-mp((hs0 ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c2)↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c2)), hs0 ∈ 𝕌)
  vex(hs0)
  eliin(s0, hs0, universe, c0, c2)
  dfss3(hs0, ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1), ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c2))
}

blocks.name: iinssd
blocks.content: Subset implication for an indexed intersection. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm iinssd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(ciin(s0, c0, c1), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c0))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c3), wceq(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c4, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  syl(w0, wss(ciin(s0, c0, c1), c2), wrex(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)))
  syl2anc(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c0), wss(c4, c2))
  rspcev(s0, c3, c0, wss(c4, c2), wss(c1, c2))
  sseq1d(c1, c2, c4, wceq(cv(s0), c3))
  iinss(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c4, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iinssd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1)⊆ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c0)
  ⊣ (s0 = c3 → c1 = c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ⊆ c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  syl(w0, ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1)⊆ c2, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2))
  syl2anc(w0, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2), c3 ∈ c0, c4 ⊆ c2)
  rspcev(s0, c3, c0, c4 ⊆ c2, c1 ⊆ c2)
  sseq1d(c1, c2, c4, s0 = c3)
  iinss(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c4, c2)
}

blocks.name: ralimda
blocks.content: Deduction quantifying both antecedent and consequent. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm ralimda(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s0, c0, w2)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wi(w1, w2))
} = {
  ex(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s0, c0, w2))
  ralrimia(s0, c0, wa(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1)), w2)
  nfan(s0, w0, wral(s0, c0, w1))
  nfra1(s0, c0, w1)
  sylc(wa(wa(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w1)
  adantlr(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  id(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  adantll(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1), wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)
  rspa(s0, c0, w1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ralimda(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(∀(s0 ∈ c0, w1)→ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, w2)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→(w1 → w2))
} = {
  ex(w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, w1), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, w2))
  ralrimia(s0, c0, (w0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, w1)), w2)
  nfan(s0, w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, w1))
  nfra1(s0, c0, w1)
  sylc(((w0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, w1))∧ s0 ∈ c0), w2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), w1)
  adantlr(w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, w1), s0 ∈ c0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  id((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  adantll(w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, w1), s0 ∈ c0, w1)
  rspa(s0, c0, w1)
}

blocks.name: iinssf
blocks.content: Subset implication for an indexed intersection. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm iinssf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wrex(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wss(ciin(s0, c0, c1), c2))
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, ciin(s0, c0, c1), c2, wrex(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)))
  syl5bi(wrex(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  eliin(s0, cv(hs0), universe, c0, c1)
  syl(wrex(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wi(wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wrex(s0, c0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  reximi(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  ssel(c1, c2, cv(hs0))
  r19.36vf(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  nfel(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(ciin(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iinssf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (∃(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2)→ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1)⊆ c2)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c2)
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1), c2, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2))
  syl5bi(∃(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2), hs0 ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1), hs0 ∈ c2, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1))
  ax-mp((hs0 ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1)↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)), hs0 ∈ 𝕌)
  vex(hs0)
  eliin(s0, hs0, universe, c0, c1)
  syl(∃(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2), (∀(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)→ hs0 ∈ c2), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ c1 → hs0 ∈ c2)))
  reximi(s0, c0, c1 ⊆ c2, (hs0 ∈ c1 → hs0 ∈ c2))
  ssel(c1, c2, hs0)
  r19.36vf(s0, c0, hs0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c2)
  nfel(s0, hs0, c2)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(∃(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: iinssdf
blocks.content: Subset implication for an indexed intersection. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm iinssdf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(ciin(s0, c0, c1), c2))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c3)
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wnfc(s0, c4)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c0))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c3), wceq(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c4, c2))
} = {
  syl(w0, wss(ciin(s0, c0, c1), c2), wrex(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)))
  syl2anc(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c0), wss(c4, c2))
  rspcef(s0, c3, c0, wss(c4, c2), wss(c1, c2))
  nfss(s0, c4, c2)
  sseq1d(c1, c2, c4, wceq(cv(s0), c3))
  iinssf(s0, c0, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iinssdf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1)⊆ c2)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c3)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c2)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c0)
  ⊣ (s0 = c3 → c1 = c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ⊆ c2)
} = {
  syl(w0, ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1)⊆ c2, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2))
  syl2anc(w0, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2), c3 ∈ c0, c4 ⊆ c2)
  rspcef(s0, c3, c0, c4 ⊆ c2, c1 ⊆ c2)
  nfss(s0, c4, c2)
  sseq1d(c1, c2, c4, s0 = c3)
  iinssf(s0, c0, c1, c2)
}
